name: LazyB
one_line_profile: Tool for economic genome assembly from low coverage Illumina and Nanopore data
detailed_description: A genome assembly tool designed to work efficiently with low-coverage hybrid datasets (Illumina and Nanopore), optimizing for cost-effective genomic reconstruction.

name: HMSSS
one_line_profile: Tool for identification of sulfur metabolism-related genes in genome assemblies
detailed_description: HMS-S-S identifies sulfur metabolism-related genes and analyzes operon structures within genome and metagenome assemblies.

name: BigDEC
one_line_profile: Scalable Big Data tool for short-read error correction
detailed_description: A Java-based tool leveraging Big Data technologies for scalable error correction of short sequencing reads.

name: Donut_Falls
one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for assembly of Nanopore sequencing data
detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline developed by UPHL-BioNGS for the assembly and processing of Nanopore sequencing reads.

name: TIPP
one_line_profile: Tool for telomere local assembly, genome polishing, and plastid assembly
detailed_description: A toolkit focused on specific assembly tasks including telomere local assembly, improved whole-genome polishing, and plastid genome assembly.

name: skandiver
one_line_profile: Tool for identifying mobile genetic elements from assembled genomes using ANI
detailed_description: A program that identifies mobile genetic elements such as prophages, plasmids, and transposases in assembled whole genome sequences using average nucleotide identity (ANI).

name: BiB_ADV-SCI--DL_for_Peptide
one_line_profile: Deep learning library and dataset for peptide self-assembly analysis
detailed_description: Provides a dataset and deep learning methods (graph and sequence-based) for analyzing and predicting peptide self-assembly properties.

name: dentist
one_line_profile: Tool to close assembly gaps using long-reads at high accuracy
detailed_description: Dentist uses long-read sequencing data to accurately close gaps in genome assemblies, improving contiguity and completeness.

name: graphamr
one_line_profile: Antibiotic resistance prediction from metagenome assembly graphs
detailed_description: A tool for predicting antibiotic resistance genes directly from metagenome assembly graphs, enabling analysis of complex metagenomic data.

name: metaGT
one_line_profile: Pipeline for metagenome and metatranscriptome joint assembly
detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the joint assembly of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data to improve assembly quality and functional annotation.

name: rnaquast
one_line_profile: Quality assessment tool for de novo transcriptome assemblies
detailed_description: A quality assessment tool specifically designed for evaluating de novo transcriptome assemblies from RNA-Seq data.

name: SPAdes
one_line_profile: Versatile genome assembler for single-cell and standard data
detailed_description: SPAdes (St. Petersburg genome assembler) is an assembly toolkit containing various assembly pipelines for different data types, including single-cell, metagenomes, and plasmids.

name: wengan
one_line_profile: Accurate and ultra-fast hybrid genome assembler
detailed_description: Wengan is a hybrid genome assembler that combines long reads (Oxford Nanopore or PacBio) with short reads (Illumina) to produce high-quality assemblies efficiently.

name: 3d-dna
one_line_profile: Pipeline for 3D de novo assembly using Hi-C data
detailed_description: A pipeline for scaffolding de novo genome assemblies using Hi-C (chromosome conformation capture) data to produce chromosome-length scaffolds.

name: Bact-Builder
one_line_profile: Microbial de novo genome assembly pipeline
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the automated de novo assembly of microbial genomes, streamlining the process from raw reads to assembled contigs.

name: virsearch
one_line_profile: Workflow to detect and classify viruses in metagenome assemblies
detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to identify and classify viral sequences within metagenomic assembly datasets.

name: JASPER
one_line_profile: Jellyfish based Assembly Sequence Polisher for Error Reduction
detailed_description: A tool that uses k-mer frequencies (via Jellyfish) to polish genome assemblies and reduce sequencing errors.

name: karect
one_line_profile: Accurate correction of substitution, insertion and deletion errors in NGS reads
detailed_description: Karect is a tool for error correction of next-generation sequencing data, handling substitutions, insertions, and deletions to improve downstream assembly quality.

name: magpurify2
one_line_profile: Tool to identify and remove contaminants from metagenome-assembled genomes
detailed_description: MAGpurify2 is designed to improve the quality of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) by detecting and removing contamination based on various genomic features.

name: SOAPdenovo2
one_line_profile: Short-read de novo genome assembler for large genomes
detailed_description: An improved version of SOAPdenovo, designed for the de novo assembly of large plant and animal genomes from short-read sequencing data.

name: T2T-Polish
one_line_profile: Evaluation and polishing workflows for Telomere-to-Telomere genome assemblies
detailed_description: A collection of workflows used for polishing and evaluating high-quality, complete (T2T) genome assemblies.

name: Chloroplast-genome-assembly
one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling chloroplast genomes using short or long reads
detailed_description: A pipeline specifically tailored for the assembly of chloroplast genomes, supporting both short-read and long-read sequencing data.

name: Organelle_PBA
one_line_profile: Assembler for chloroplast and mitochondrial genomes using PacBio data
detailed_description: A software pipeline designed to assemble organelle genomes (chloroplast and mitochondria) specifically from PacBio long-read sequencing data.

name: GRAbB
one_line_profile: Genome Region Assembly by Baiting for targeted assembly
detailed_description: GRAbB (Genome Region Assembly by Baiting) is a program designed to assemble selected regions of the genome or transcriptome using reference sequences and NGS data.

name: sparrowhawk
one_line_profile: Short-read assembler for bacterial genomics based on de Bruijn graph
detailed_description: A short-read assembler specifically designed for bacterial genomics, implementing a de Bruijn graph approach in Rust.

name: wf-paired-end-illumina-assembly
one_line_profile: Workflow for genome assembly of Illumina paired-end sequence data
detailed_description: A pathogen-agnostic general workflow for the assembly of Illumina paired-end sequence data, maintained by the Bacterial Genomics group.

name: JTK
one_line_profile: Regional diploid genome assembler
detailed_description: JTK is a regional diploid genome assembler written in Rust, designed to handle specific genomic regions.

name: AlignGraph
one_line_profile: Secondary de novo genome assembly guided by closely related references
detailed_description: AlignGraph is an algorithm for secondary de novo genome assembly that uses closely related reference genomes to guide the assembly process and improve contiguity.

name: BRANCH
one_line_profile: Boosting RNA-Seq assemblies with partial or related genomic sequences
detailed_description: BRANCH is a tool designed to improve RNA-Seq assemblies by utilizing partial or related genomic sequences as guidance.

name: RAILS
one_line_profile: Assembly improvement by long sequence scaffolding and gap-filling
detailed_description: RAILS and Cobbler are tools for scaffolding and gap-filling genome assemblies using long DNA sequences.

name: SSAKE
one_line_profile: Genomic assembler for short sequence reads
detailed_description: SSAKE is a genomics application for assembling millions of very short DNA sequences, one of the earliest short-read assemblers.

name: TASR
one_line_profile: Targeted Assembly of Short Reads
detailed_description: TASR (Targeted Assembly of Short Reads) is a tool for targeted assembly of specific genomic regions from short read data.

name: ABySS
one_line_profile: De novo genome assembler for short reads
detailed_description: ABySS is a de novo sequence assembler intended for short paired-end reads and large genomes.

name: ARCS
one_line_profile: Scaffold genome sequence assemblies using linked or long read data
detailed_description: ARCS is a tool for scaffolding genome sequence assemblies using linked reads (e.g., 10x Genomics) or long reads.

name: GoldPolish
one_line_profile: Long read sequence polisher
detailed_description: GoldPolish (aka GoldRush-Edit) is a long read sequence polisher used within the GoldRush assembler pipeline.

name: GoldRush
one_line_profile: Linear-time de novo long read assembler
detailed_description: GoldRush is a linear-time de novo assembler designed for long read sequencing data.

name: Kollector
one_line_profile: De novo targeted gene assembly
detailed_description: Kollector is a tool for the de novo assembly of targeted genes or genomic regions.

name: mtGrasp
one_line_profile: De novo reference-grade mitochondrial genome assembly
detailed_description: mtGrasp is a tool for de novo reference-grade mitochondrial genome assembly and standardization.

name: ntEdit
one_line_profile: Genome assembly polishing and SNV detection
detailed_description: ntEdit is a scalable genome assembly polishing tool that uses Bloom filters to correct errors and detect SNVs.

name: Trans-ABySS
one_line_profile: De novo assembly of RNA-seq data using ABySS
detailed_description: Trans-ABySS is a software pipeline for de novo assembly of RNA-seq data, utilizing the ABySS assembler.

name: metagenome_assembly
one_line_profile: WDL Workflow for metagenome assembly
detailed_description: A WDL-based workflow for performing metagenome assembly, likely developed for institutional use.

name: w2rap-contigger
one_line_profile: Illumina PE genome contig assembler for large complex genomes
detailed_description: An Illumina paired-end genome contig assembler capable of handling large (e.g., 17Gbp) and complex (e.g., hexaploid) genomes.

name: LSC
one_line_profile: Long read error correction tool
detailed_description: LSC is a tool designed for the error correction of long reads (e.g., PacBio) using short reads to improve accuracy.

name: Jabba
one_line_profile: Read error correction tool for PacBio data
detailed_description: Jabba is a tool specifically designed for correcting errors in PacBio long-read sequencing data.

name: FEHAT
one_line_profile: Software to detect heart rate from medaka embryos
detailed_description: A software tool for analyzing video or image data to detect and calculate the heart rate of medaka fish embryos.

name: assemblotron
one_line_profile: Automated optimisation of de-novo transcriptome assembly
detailed_description: Assemblotron is a tool for automating the optimization of parameters for de novo transcriptome assembly to improve quality.

name: myloasm
one_line_profile: High-resolution long-read metagenome assembler
detailed_description: Myloasm is a de novo assembler designed for high-resolution assembly of metagenomes from long-read data, capable of handling noisy reads.

name: KIPEs
one_line_profile: Knowledge-based Identification of Pathway Enzymes
detailed_description: KIPEs performs automatic annotation of flavonoid biosynthesis steps in transcriptome or genome assemblies.

name: MGSE
one_line_profile: Mapping-based Genome Size Estimation
detailed_description: MGSE estimates genome size based on read mapping to an existing genome assembly.

name: Pilon
one_line_profile: Genome assembly improvement and variant detection tool
detailed_description: Pilon is a software tool for automatically improving genome assemblies and detecting variants (SNPs and indels) using read alignments.

name: viral-ngs
one_line_profile: Viral genomics analysis pipelines
detailed_description: A collection of pipelines for viral genomics analysis, including assembly, phylogenetics, and classification (Note: Deprecated in favor of newer modular repos but historically significant).

name: OATK
one_line_profile: Organelle de novo genome assembly toolkit
detailed_description: OATK is a toolkit designed for the de novo assembly of organelle genomes (mitochondria and plastids).

name: BRASS
one_line_profile: Breakpoints via assembly for rearrangement detection
detailed_description: BRASS (Breakpoints via assembly) identifies breakpoints and attempts to assemble rearrangements in whole genome sequencing data.

name: bin3C
one_line_profile: Extract metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) using Hi-C
detailed_description: bin3C is a tool for extracting metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) from metagenomic data by leveraging Hi-C contact information.

name: Shasta
one_line_profile: De novo assembly from Oxford Nanopore reads
detailed_description: Shasta is a de novo genome assembler specifically designed for Oxford Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

name: Hifiasm
one_line_profile: Haplotype-resolved assembler for accurate Hifi reads
detailed_description: Hifiasm is a fast haplotype-resolved de novo assembler for PacBio HiFi reads. It can produce haplotype-resolved assemblies from HiFi reads alone or with Hi-C/trio data.

name: EukMetaSanity
one_line_profile: Structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic metagenome-assembled genomes
detailed_description: EukMetaSanity is a pipeline designed for the structural and functional annotation of eukaryotic genomes recovered from metagenomic datasets (MAGs).

name: LODA
one_line_profile: Tool for mining integer sequence programs
detailed_description: LODA is an assembly language, a computational model, and a tool for mining programs that generate integer sequences, often used in experimental mathematics.

name: dnaPipeTE
one_line_profile: De-novo assembly & annotation pipeline for Transposable Elements
detailed_description: dnaPipeTE is a pipeline designed to find, annotate, and quantify Transposable Elements in small samples of NGS datasets without requiring genome assembly.

name: RATTLE
one_line_profile: Reference-free reconstruction and error correction of transcriptomes from Nanopore
detailed_description: RATTLE performs reference-free reconstruction and error correction of transcriptomes using Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

name: Tablet
one_line_profile: Graphical viewer for NGS assemblies and alignments
detailed_description: Tablet is a lightweight, high-performance graphical viewer for next generation sequence assemblies and alignments.

name: Spade UI
one_line_profile: User interface for SPADE flow cytometry analysis
detailed_description: The user interface component for SPADE (Spanning-tree Progression Analysis of Density-normalized Events), a visualization and analysis tool for high-dimensional flow cytometry data.

name: RegCloser
one_line_profile: Genome gap-closing tool based on robust regression
detailed_description: RegCloser is a tool for closing gaps in genome assemblies using a robust regression approach, applicable to NGS and TGS data.

name: NanoForms
one_line_profile: Server for processing, analysis and assembly of Nanopore sequencing data
detailed_description: NanoForms is an integrated server for processing, analysis, and assembly of raw sequencing data of microbial genomes from Oxford Nanopore technology.

name: denovopipeline
one_line_profile: Pipeline for de novo peptide sequencing and assembly
detailed_description: A pipeline for de novo peptide sequencing (using Novor, DeepNovo, etc.) and assembly with ALPS.

name: DETONATE
one_line_profile: De novo Transcriptome RNA-seq Assembly evaluation tool
detailed_description: DETONATE (DE novo TranscriptOme rNa-seq Assembly with or without the Truth Evaluation) is a software package for evaluating de novo transcriptome assemblies.

name: RefineM
one_line_profile: Toolbox for improving metagenome-assembled genomes
detailed_description: RefineM is a toolbox for improving the quality of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) by identifying and removing contamination.

name: PacBio-utilities
one_line_profile: Utilities for working with PacBio-based assemblies
detailed_description: A collection of utilities for working with PacBio-based genome assemblies, including tools for processing and analyzing long-read data.

name: HiCBin
one_line_profile: Binning metagenomic contigs using Hi-C contact maps
detailed_description: HiCBin is a tool for binning metagenomic contigs and recovering metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs) using Hi-C contact maps.

name: Oases
one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembler for short reads
detailed_description: Oases is a de novo transcriptome assembler designed to produce transcripts from short read sequencing technologies.

name: Velvet
one_line_profile: Short read de novo assembler using de Bruijn graphs
detailed_description: Velvet is a de novo genomic assembler specially designed for short read sequencing technologies, using de Bruijn graphs.

name: Jitterbug
one_line_profile: Predicts insertion sites of transposable elements
detailed_description: Jitterbug is a bioinformatic tool that predicts insertion sites of transposable elements in a sample sequenced by short paired-end reads with respect to an assembled reference.

name: ARGfams
one_line_profile: Identification of antibiotic resistance genes from genomes
detailed_description: ARGfams is a tool and database for the fast and robust identification of antibiotic resistance genes (ARGs) from microbial genomes and metagenome assemblies using HMM profiles.

name: MGEfams
one_line_profile: Identification of mobile genetic elements from genomes
detailed_description: MGEfams is a tool and database for the fast and robust identification of mobile genetic elements (MGE) genes from genomes and metagenome assemblies.

name: Argonaut
one_line_profile: Pipeline for genome assembly accepting long and short reads
detailed_description: Argonaut is a pipeline for genome assembly that accepts ONT and/or PacBio HiFi long reads as well as Illumina short reads.

name: CirculoCov
one_line_profile: Estimates coverage of reads on a draft assembly
detailed_description: CirculoCov estimates the coverage of nanopore or illumina reads on a draft assembly, useful for assessing assembly quality.

name: BRIGAD3
one_line_profile: Visualization of bacterial genome assemblies from nanopore data
detailed_description: BRIGAD3 is a D3 and Vue component for the visualization of bacterial genome assemblies derived from nanopore sequence data.

name: DBG_assembly
one_line_profile: Genome assembler for second-generation sequencing data
detailed_description: DBG_assembly is developed for assembling genomes with second-generation sequencing data, specifically Illumina short reads, comparable to SOAPdenovo.

name: EndHiC
one_line_profile: Hi-C scaffolding tool using contig end regions
detailed_description: EndHic is a fast Hi-C scaffolding tool that uses Hi-C links from contig end regions to assemble large contigs into chromosomal-level scaffolds.

name: SALA
one_line_profile: Transcript Start-site Aware Long-read Assembler
detailed_description: SALA is a de novo assembler for long reads into transcript and gene models, incorporating support from confident transcription start sites.

name: Bactflow
one_line_profile: Workflow for whole genome assembly of ONT data
detailed_description: Bactflow is a workflow containing a set of tools for whole genome assembly and visualization of Oxford Nanopore Technology sequencing reads.

name: strainFlye
one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing rare mutations in metagenome-assembled genomes
detailed_description: strainFlye is a pipeline for analyzing rare mutations and strain-level variation in metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

name: CARE
one_line_profile: Context-Aware Read Error correction for Illumina reads
detailed_description: CARE is a tool for Context-Aware Read Error correction specifically designed for Illumina sequencing reads.

name: MpGAP
one_line_profile: Multi-platform genome assembly pipeline for Illumina, Nanopore and PacBio reads
detailed_description: A comprehensive genome assembly pipeline designed to handle data from multiple sequencing platforms including Illumina, Nanopore, and PacBio, facilitating hybrid assembly strategies.

name: GALA
one_line_profile: Long-reads Gap-free Chromosome-scale Assembler
detailed_description: A chromosome-scale assembly tool designed for long-read sequencing data, aiming to produce gap-free assemblies through a multi-step process involving graph-based methods.

name: NanoDJ
one_line_profile: Interactive Jupyter Notebook environment for Nanopore sequence manipulation and assembly
detailed_description: A Dockerized Jupyter Notebook environment pre-configured with tools for interactive manipulation, quality control, and assembly of Oxford Nanopore MinION sequencing data.

name: Gfapy
one_line_profile: Flexible software library for handling sequence graphs (GFA) in Python
detailed_description: A Python library for reading, writing, and manipulating sequence graphs in the Graphical Fragment Assembly (GFA) format, supporting GFA1 and GFA2 standards.

name: DeepPolisher
one_line_profile: Transformer-based sequence correction method for genome assembly polishing
detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool utilizing Transformer architectures to correct errors in genome assemblies, specifically designed to polish sequences and improve consensus quality.

name: Chromosomer
one_line_profile: Reference-assisted assembly tool for producing draft chromosome sequences
detailed_description: A tool that automates the process of assembling draft chromosome sequences from fragmented assemblies using a reference genome as a guide.

name: Cornetto
one_line_profile: Adaptive genome assembly using nanopore sequencing
detailed_description: A genome assembly tool tailored for Nanopore sequencing data, employing adaptive strategies to handle the specific error profiles of long reads.

name: FMLRC
one_line_profile: Long-read error correction tool using the multi-string Burrows Wheeler Transform
detailed_description: A high-performance error correction tool for long reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore) that leverages the FM-index of the short-read sequencing data (MSBWT) to correct errors.

name: GSAT
one_line_profile: Graph-based Sequence Assembly Toolkit
detailed_description: A toolkit providing graph-based methods for sequence assembly tasks, facilitating the manipulation and analysis of assembly graphs.

name: HAPO-G
one_line_profile: Genome assembly polishing tool using accurate reads
detailed_description: A tool designed to improve the quality of genome assemblies (polishing) by utilizing accurate short reads to correct errors in the consensus sequence.

name: Racon
one_line_profile: Ultrafast consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly
detailed_description: A highly efficient consensus module for raw de novo genome assembly of long uncorrected reads, often used as a polishing step in assembly pipelines.

name: ectools
one_line_profile: Tools for error correction and working with long read data
detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools designed for the error correction of long-read sequencing data (e.g., PacBio) and related assembly tasks.

name: Strainy
one_line_profile: Graph-based assembly phasing tool
detailed_description: A tool for phasing metagenomic assemblies using assembly graphs, enabling the resolution of strain-level variations.

name: hifiasm2txt
one_line_profile: Converter for hifiasm binary output to text format
detailed_description: A utility tool designed to convert binary output files from the hifiasm assembler into human-readable text format, facilitating downstream analysis and debugging of assembly graphs.

name: Rcorrector
one_line_profile: K-mer based error correction for Illumina RNA-seq reads
detailed_description: A tool designed specifically for correcting errors in Illumina RNA-seq reads. It uses a De Bruijn graph to identify and correct sequencing errors, which is crucial for accurate de novo transcriptome assembly.

name: Fast-Plast
one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for de novo assembly of chloroplast genomes
detailed_description: A pipeline designed to assemble whole chloroplast genomes from whole genome sequencing data. It automates the process of cleaning, assembling, and scaffolding plastid genomes.

name: MAGpy
one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for annotating metagenome-assembled genomes
detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline built with Snakemake for the downstream analysis and annotation of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs), integrating various tools for functional and taxonomic characterization.

name: medaka
one_line_profile: Neural network-based sequence correction and polishing for Nanopore reads
detailed_description: A tool to create consensus sequences and variant calls from nanopore sequencing data. It uses neural networks to perform sequence correction and is the standard polishing tool provided by Oxford Nanopore Technologies.

name: messer
one_line_profile: Workflow for post-assembly small plasmid recovery and size correction
detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed to recover small plasmids that might be missed or misassembled in standard nanopore assembly pipelines, and to correct their sizes.

name: stylo
one_line_profile: Nanopore assembly workflow from basecalling to polishing
detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline for processing Nanopore data, covering basecalling, assembly, polishing, QC metrics, and plasmid replicon detection.

name: nf-core/bacass
one_line_profile: Pipeline for simple bacterial assembly and annotation
detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for the assembly and annotation of bacterial genomes. It automates the use of tools like Unicycler, Prokka, and QUAST.

name: nf-core/denovotranscript
one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembly pipeline for RNA-seq data
detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for de novo assembly of transcriptomes from paired-end RNA-seq data, utilizing tools like Trinity or SPAdes and performing quality assessment.

name: nf-core/funcscan
one_line_profile: Pipeline for screening functional and natural product gene sequences
detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline designed to screen genomic or metagenomic assemblies for functional genes and biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) using various detection tools.

name: nf-core/genomeassembler
one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly of haploid genomes from long reads
detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for assembling and scaffolding haploid or unphased genomes using long-read sequencing data (ONT or PacBio HiFi).

name: nf-core/mag
one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembly, binning, and annotation of metagenomes
detailed_description: A comprehensive nf-core pipeline for metagenome analysis, including assembly (SPAdes, Megahit), binning (MetaBAT2, MaxBin2), and quality assessment of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs).

name: nf-core/viralrecon
one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral assembly and variant calling
detailed_description: A nf-core pipeline for the analysis of viral sequencing data, performing de novo assembly, alignment, and variant calling, particularly optimized for SARS-CoV-2 and other viral pathogens.

name: SPADE
one_line_profile: Spanning Tree Progression of Density Normalized Events for flow cytometry
detailed_description: A visualization and analysis tool for high-dimensional flow cytometry data. It organizes cellular data into a hierarchy of related phenotypes using a spanning tree structure.

name: SSPACE Basic
one_line_profile: Scaffolding of pre-assembled contigs using paired-read data
detailed_description: A stand-alone scaffolder of pre-assembled contigs using paired-read data. It extends contigs and connects them into scaffolds based on distance information from paired reads.

name: isovar
one_line_profile: Assembly of RNA reads to determine cancer mutation effects
detailed_description: A tool for assembling RNA-seq reads around somatic mutation sites to determine the exact protein sequence variant expressed by a cancer mutation, aiding in neoantigen prediction.

name: maf2sam
one_line_profile: Converter from MIRA Assembly Format to SAM format
detailed_description: A utility script to convert the MIRA Assembly Format (MAF) generated by the MIRA assembler into the standard Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) format.

name: phasebook
one_line_profile: Haplotype-aware de novo assembly of diploid genomes
detailed_description: A tool for de novo assembly of diploid genomes from long reads (PacBio/ONT), specifically designed to be haplotype-aware and resolve phases during assembly.

name: FALCON-Phase
one_line_profile: Integration of PacBio assemblies with Hi-C data for phasing
detailed_description: A tool that integrates PacBio long-read assemblies with Hi-C chromatin interaction data to create phased, diploid, chromosome-scale scaffolds.

name: AGC (Assembled Genomes Compressor)
one_line_profile: High-performance compressor for assembled genome collections
detailed_description: AGC is a tool designed to compress collections of assembled genomes. It offers significantly better compression ratios than general-purpose compressors by exploiting similarities between genomes in the collection.

name: Aviary
one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly and MAG recovery pipeline for metagenomics
detailed_description: Aviary is a metagenomics pipeline that performs hybrid assembly (using both short and long reads), binning to recover Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs), and annotation.

name: hash10x
one_line_profile: Toolset for analysis and assembly of 10X Genomics linked reads
detailed_description: A collection of tools for processing and analyzing 10X Genomics linked read data, specifically designed to aid in de novo assembly tasks.

name: Nanopore Assembly Assessment
one_line_profile: Pipeline for evaluating Nanopore assembly and polishing performance
detailed_description: A Python-based automation tool for running and assessing various assembly and polishing pipelines for Nanopore data, including performance evaluation and visualization.

name: Rotary
one_line_profile: Assembly and annotation workflow for circular DNA from Nanopore reads
detailed_description: A workflow designed for the assembly and annotation of microbial genomes containing circular DNA elements (like plasmids) using Nanopore long reads.

name: Dragonflye
one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Nanopore reads
detailed_description: Dragonflye is a pipeline built on top of Flye, specifically tailored for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Oxford Nanopore reads, handling polishing and other processing steps.

name: Bandage
one_line_profile: Visualizer for de novo assembly graphs (GFA)
detailed_description: Bandage is a GUI program that allows users to interact with the assembly graphs made by de novo assemblers such as Velvet, SPAdes, MEGAHIT and others. It visualizes the graph topology and allows for exploration of nodes and connections.

name: Minipolish
one_line_profile: Polishing tool for miniasm assemblies using Racon
detailed_description: Minipolish is a wrapper script that bridges the gap between the miniasm assembler and the Racon polisher, automating the polishing process for long-read assemblies.

name: Polypolish
one_line_profile: Short-read polisher for long-read assemblies
detailed_description: Polypolish uses short reads (Illumina) to fix errors in long-read assemblies (Nanopore/PacBio). It is specifically designed to correct errors in repeat regions that other polishers might miss.

name: Unicycler
one_line_profile: Hybrid assembly pipeline for bacterial genomes
detailed_description: Unicycler is a genome assembler specifically designed for bacterial genomes. It functions as a hybrid assembler (using both short and long reads) or as a long-read only assembler, aiming to produce complete, circularized genomes.

name: SMARTdenovo
one_line_profile: Ultra-fast de novo assembler for long noisy reads
detailed_description: SMARTdenovo is a de novo assembler designed for long noisy reads (PacBio/Nanopore). It does not require error correction prior to assembly and is optimized for speed.

name: wtdbg2 (Redbean)
one_line_profile: Fuzzy Bruijn graph assembler for long noisy reads
detailed_description: wtdbg2 (also known as Redbean) is a de novo sequence assembler for long noisy reads. It uses a fuzzy Bruijn graph approach which makes it extremely fast and memory efficient compared to OLC-based assemblers.

name: Rala
one_line_profile: Layout module for raw de novo genome assembly
detailed_description: Rala is a standalone layout module intended for the assembly of raw, uncorrected long reads. It is often used in conjunction with other modular assembly tools like Racon and Raven.

name: Sanger Metagenome Assembly
one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for metagenome assembly and binning
detailed_description: A comprehensive Nextflow pipeline developed by the Sanger Institute for assembling and binning metagenomes using PacBio HiFi and Illumina Hi-C sequencing data.

name: centroFlye
one_line_profile: Centromere assembly algorithm using long error-prone reads
detailed_description: centroFlye is a specialized assembly algorithm designed to reconstruct the highly repetitive centromeric regions of genomes using long, error-prone sequencing reads.

name: Mabs
one_line_profile: Genome assembly optimizer for Hifiasm and Flye
detailed_description: Mabs is a tool that automates the optimization of parameters for popular assemblers like Hifiasm and Flye to improve assembly quality.

name: AssemblyByPacBio
one_line_profile: Scripts for PacBio SMRT read processing and barcode assignment
detailed_description: A collection of scripts from the Shendure Lab for processing PacBio SMRT reads, specifically for assigning barcodes to variable regions, aiding in downstream assembly or analysis.

name: B.NanoAmP
one_line_profile: Bacterial Nanopore Assembly Pipeline
detailed_description: A pipeline designed for the assembly of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore sequencing data.

name: PlasFlow
one_line_profile: Plasmid sequence prediction in metagenomic assemblies
detailed_description: PlasFlow is a tool for predicting plasmid sequences within metagenomic assemblies using neural networks, helping to distinguish plasmids from chromosomal DNA.

name: MAGpurify
one_line_profile: Tool for cleaning and improving metagenome-assembled genomes
detailed_description: MAGpurify is a post-processing tool for metagenomic assemblies. It identifies and removes contaminant contigs from Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) to improve their quality.

name: Stitch
one_line_profile: Template-based assembly of proteomics short reads
detailed_description: Stitch is a tool for the de novo assembly of antibody sequences and repertoire profiling using proteomics short read data. It applies assembly principles to protein sequencing.

name: assemblage
one_line_profile: Utilities for working with genome assemblies and sequences
detailed_description: A collection of Perl scripts and tools for processing, analyzing, and manipulating second-generation genome assemblies and FASTA sequences.

name: ALGA
one_line_profile: Short read de novo genome assembler
detailed_description: ALGA is a de novo genome assembler designed for short read sequencing data.

name: HiMT
one_line_profile: Toolkit for assembling plant mitochondrial genomes using HiFi reads
detailed_description: HiMT is an integrative toolkit specifically designed for the assembly of complex plant mitochondrial genomes using PacBio HiFi reads.

name: SPADEVizR
one_line_profile: R package for visualization and analysis of SPADE cytometry results
detailed_description: SPADEVizR is an R package designed to visualize, analyze, and integrate results from SPADE (Spanning-tree Progression Analysis of Density-normalized Events), a clustering algorithm used in flow cytometry and mass cytometry.

name: transXpress
one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for de novo transcriptome assembly and annotation
detailed_description: transXpress is a Snakemake pipeline designed to streamline the process of de novo transcriptome assembly and annotation, facilitating reproducible analysis of RNA-Seq data.

name: Trinity
one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembler for RNA-Seq data
detailed_description: Trinity represents a novel method for the efficient and robust de novo reconstruction of transcriptomes from RNA-Seq data. It partitions the sequence data into many individual de Bruijn graphs, each representing the transcriptional complexity at a given gene or locus.

name: mokka
one_line_profile: Automated annotation tool for metagenome assemblies
detailed_description: Mokka is a tool designed to annotate metagenome assemblies, likely wrapping other annotation tools to provide a streamlined process for characterizing metagenomic contigs.

name: polyfix
one_line_profile: Tool to repair nanopore assemblies using related genomes
detailed_description: Polyfix is a utility for polishing and repairing Nanopore-based genome assemblies by leveraging information from related reference genomes to correct errors.

name: shovill
one_line_profile: Faster SPAdes assembler wrapper for bacterial isolate genomes
detailed_description: Shovill is a pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Illumina paired-end reads. It uses SPAdes at its core but alters the steps before and after assembly to improve speed and consistency.

name: autopore
one_line_profile: CWL workflows for nanopore de novo assembly
detailed_description: Autopore is a suite of Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows designed to automate the de novo assembly of genomes using Oxford Nanopore sequencing data.

name: teloscope
one_line_profile: Telomere annotation tool for genome assemblies
detailed_description: Teloscope is a comprehensive tool for annotating telomeres in genome assemblies and graphs, aiding in the structural analysis of chromosome ends.

name: HapCUT2
one_line_profile: Haplotype assembly and phasing tool
detailed_description: HapCUT2 is a tool for haplotype assembly from sequencing data. It is designed to phase variants and assemble haplotypes with high accuracy using reads from various sequencing technologies.

name: Metaphor
one_line_profile: Workflow for assembly and binning of metagenomes
detailed_description: Metaphor is a general-purpose automated workflow for the assembly and binning of metagenomic data, integrating multiple tools to produce metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

name: MEGAHIT
one_line_profile: Ultra-fast and memory-efficient metagenome assembler
detailed_description: MEGAHIT is a single-node assembler for large and complex metagenomics NGS reads. It makes use of succinct de Bruijn graphs (SdBG) to achieve low memory usage and high speed.

name: HASLR
one_line_profile: Hybrid assembler for long and short reads
detailed_description: HASLR is a fast and memory-efficient tool for hybrid genome assembly that utilizes both long reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore) and short reads (Illumina) to produce high-quality assemblies.

name: OM-HiC-scaffolding
one_line_profile: Scaffolding workflows using optical mapping and Hi-C data
detailed_description: This repository provides workflows for correcting and scaffolding long-read genome assemblies (PacBio, Nanopore) by integrating Optical Mapping and/or Dovetail Hi-C data.

name: Spriggan
one_line_profile: Pipeline for bacterial assembly and AMR gene identification
detailed_description: Spriggan is a bioinformatics pipeline developed for the assembly of bacterial whole genome sequence data and the subsequent identification of antibiotic resistance genes.

name: galah
one_line_profile: Scalable dereplication tool for metagenome assembled genomes
detailed_description: Galah is a tool designed for the scalable dereplication of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), helping to cluster and select representative genomes from large datasets.

name: RAGA
one_line_profile: Reference-Assisted Genome Assembly tool
detailed_description: RAGA (Reference-Assisted Genome Assembly) is a tool that generates alternative long reads by leveraging target assemblies, PacBio HiFi reads, and a reference genome to improve assembly outcomes.

name: MECAT
one_line_profile: Fast mapping, error correction and assembly for single-molecule reads
detailed_description: MECAT is an ultra-fast mapping, error correction, and de novo assembly tool designed specifically for single-molecule sequencing reads (e.g., PacBio, Nanopore).

name: Ig Repertoire Constructor
one_line_profile: Error-correction and assembly for immunosequencing data
detailed_description: Ig Repertoire Constructor is an algorithm for the error-correction of immunosequencing Illumina MiSeq reads and performs immunoproteogenomic analysis, specifically for antibody repertoire assembly.

name: DBG2OLC
one_line_profile: Hybrid genome assembler using long and short reads
detailed_description: DBG2OLC is a genome assembler that efficiently combines long, erroneous third-generation sequencing reads with short, accurate NGS reads to produce high-quality assemblies with reduced computational cost.

name: HapHiC
one_line_profile: Allele-aware scaffolding tool based on Hi-C data
detailed_description: HapHiC is a fast, reference-independent, and allele-aware scaffolding tool that utilizes Hi-C data to scaffold contigs into chromosome-scale assemblies, particularly useful for polyploid or heterozygous genomes.

name: EToKi
one_line_profile: Enterobase Tool Kit for bacterial genomic analysis
detailed_description: EToKi (Enterobase Tool Kit) contains the standalone implementation of the pipelines and methods used by Enterobase for the assembly, analysis, and typing of bacterial genomes.

name: HyPPO
one_line_profile: Hybrid prediction tool for paralogs and orthologs
detailed_description: HyPPO (Hybrid Prediction of Paralogs and Orthologs) is a tool designed to infer orthology and paralogy relationships between genes, combining different prediction strategies.

name: TIRmite
one_line_profile: Tool for annotating MITEs and DNA-Transposons using TIR-pHMM models
detailed_description: TIRmite maps TIR-pHMM models to genomic sequences to annotate Miniature Inverted-repeat Transposable Elements (MITEs) and complete DNA-Transposons.

name: GeneOrthology
one_line_profile: R package for collecting gene ortholog information from NCBI
detailed_description: A utility package providing functions and datasets to retrieve and organize gene orthology information sourced from NCBI, facilitating comparative genomic analysis.

name: FeGenie
one_line_profile: HMM-based identification of iron-related genes and operons
detailed_description: FeGenie is a bioinformatics tool that uses Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) to identify and categorize genes and operons involved in iron acquisition and metabolism in genomes and metagenomes.

name: MagicLamp
one_line_profile: Platform for targeted annotation using HMM sets
detailed_description: MagicLamp is a platform designed for the targeted annotation of genomic, metagenomic, and metatranscriptomic datasets using curated sets of Hidden Markov Models (HMMs).

name: stmp
one_line_profile: Sequence to Medical Phenotypes pipeline
detailed_description: STMP is a comprehensive pipeline for variant annotation, prioritization, and pharmacogenomics analysis, specifically designed for analyzing genomic trios (mother, father, child) to link sequence data to medical phenotypes.

name: MFannot
one_line_profile: Annotation tool for mitochondrial and plastid genomes
detailed_description: MFannot is a specialized program for annotating organelle genomes, specifically mitochondria and plastids, identifying genes, tRNAs, and introns.

name: eukan
one_line_profile: Eukaryotic genome annotation pipeline
detailed_description: Eukan is a pipeline designed for the annotation of eukaryotic genomes, automating the process of gene prediction and functional annotation.

name: HaMStR
one_line_profile: Feature-aware orthology prediction tool
detailed_description: HaMStR is a tool for determining orthology relationships between genes, utilizing Hidden Markov Models and feature-aware strategies to improve prediction accuracy.

name: PhyloProfile
one_line_profile: Visualization and analysis tool for phylogenetic profiles
detailed_description: PhyloProfile is an R-based tool for visualizing and analyzing phylogenetic profiles, helping researchers explore the evolutionary history and functional associations of genes across species.

name: fDOG
one_line_profile: Feature-aware Directed OrtholoG search tool
detailed_description: fDOG (Feature-aware Directed OrtholoG search) is a tool for identifying orthologous genes in genomic sequences, incorporating feature information to enhance search sensitivity and specificity.

name: Watershed
one_line_profile: Model for prioritizing functional rare genetic variants
detailed_description: Watershed is a probabilistic model that integrates genomic annotations and RNA-seq data to prioritize rare genetic variants that are likely to have functional effects.

name: coRdon
one_line_profile: R package for codon usage analysis and gene expressivity prediction
detailed_description: coRdon is an R/Bioconductor package used for analyzing codon usage patterns in DNA sequences and predicting gene expressivity based on codon bias.

name: ProteomeLM
one_line_profile: Proteome-scale language model for protein interaction and essentiality prediction
detailed_description: ProteomeLM is a protein language model designed to predict protein-protein interactions and gene essentiality across various taxa by learning from proteome-scale sequence data.

name: Control-FREEC
one_line_profile: Copy number and genotype annotation tool for sequencing data
detailed_description: Control-FREEC is a tool for detecting copy number variations (CNVs) and loss of heterozygosity (LOH) in whole genome and whole exome sequencing data, providing genotype annotations.

name: geneXtendeR
one_line_profile: R package for functional annotation of ChIP-seq data
detailed_description: geneXtendeR is an R/Bioconductor package designed to optimize the functional annotation of ChIP-seq peaks by extending gene boundaries to capture distal regulatory elements.

name: SURFY2
one_line_profile: Machine learning classifier for human surfaceome prediction
detailed_description: SURFY2 is a machine learning-based tool that predicts whether a human transmembrane protein is located at the cell surface or in intracellular membranes, utilizing an ensemble of classifiers and feature engineering.

name: FANTASIA
one_line_profile: Functional annotation tool based on embedding space similarity
detailed_description: FANTASIA (Functional ANnoTAtion based on embedding space SImilArity) is a tool that leverages embedding representations of biological sequences to perform functional annotation through similarity search.

name: TOSTADAS
one_line_profile: Toolkit for sequence triage, annotation, and database submission
detailed_description: TOSTADAS is a toolkit developed by the CDC for the triage, annotation, and submission of genomic sequence data to public databases, streamlining public health bioinformatics workflows.

name: drugreflector
one_line_profile: Drug ranking from gene expression signatures
detailed_description: DrugReflector uses ensemble neural network models to rank compounds and predict their efficacy based on gene expression signatures, aiding in drug discovery and repurposing.

name: FunGAP
one_line_profile: Fungal Genome Annotation Pipeline
detailed_description: FunGAP is a comprehensive pipeline specifically designed for the prediction and annotation of genes in fungal genomes, integrating multiple evidence sources for high-quality annotation.

name: FastOMA
one_line_profile: Scalable software for orthology inference
detailed_description: FastOMA is a computationally efficient and scalable software package for inferring orthology relationships between genes across large numbers of genomes.

name: OMAnnotator
one_line_profile: Consensus genome annotation tool using OMA
detailed_description: OMAnnotator utilizes the OMA (Orthologous MAtrix) database and algorithms to provide consensus functional annotations for genomes based on orthology information.

name: REAT
one_line_profile: Robust Eukaryotic Annotation Toolkit for genome annotation
detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for eukaryotic genome annotation, integrating various tools to predict gene structures and functions.

name: HMMER
one_line_profile: Biological sequence analysis using profile hidden Markov models
detailed_description: HMMER is used for searching sequence databases for sequence homologs, and for making sequence alignments. It implements methods using probabilistic models called profile hidden Markov models (profile HMMs).

name: AUGUSTUS
one_line_profile: Gene prediction tool for eukaryotic genomes
detailed_description: AUGUSTUS is a program that predicts genes in eukaryotic genomic sequences. It can be used as an ab initio gene finder or incorporate hints from RNA-Seq or protein alignments.

name: BRAKER
one_line_profile: Automated pipeline for eukaryotic gene structure prediction
detailed_description: BRAKER is a pipeline for fully automated prediction of protein coding gene structures using GeneMark-ES/ET/EP/ETP and AUGUSTUS in novel eukaryotic genomes.

name: GALBA
one_line_profile: Automated gene prediction pipeline using protein homology
detailed_description: GALBA is a pipeline for fully automated prediction of protein coding gene structures with AUGUSTUS in novel eukaryotic genomes, specifically utilizing high-quality proteins from related species.

name: Tiberius
one_line_profile: Deep learning-based gene finder
detailed_description: Tiberius is a gene finder that utilizes deep learning techniques to predict gene structures in genomic sequences.

name: Genet
one_line_profile: Library for genome editing and CRISPR gRNA design
detailed_description: A Python library designed for genome editing tasks, including CRISPR gRNA design and prediction of editing outcomes.

name: oncoPredict
one_line_profile: Drug response and drug-gene association prediction
detailed_description: An R package for predicting drug response in cancer samples and identifying drug-gene associations.

name: OrthoHMM
one_line_profile: Inference of ortholog groups using Hidden Markov Models
detailed_description: A tool for improved inference of ortholog groups utilizing Hidden Markov Models to analyze sequence relationships.

name: OrthoSnap
one_line_profile: Retrieval of single-copy orthologs from gene family trees
detailed_description: A tree splitting and pruning algorithm designed to identify and retrieve single-copy orthologs from larger gene family trees.

name: Seave
one_line_profile: Web platform for filtering and annotating genetic variants
detailed_description: Seave is a web-based platform for filtering and annotating genomic variants, supporting various inheritance patterns and disease database integrations.

name: RAPToR
one_line_profile: Developmental age prediction from transcriptome data
detailed_description: RAPToR (Real Age Prediction from Transcriptome staging on Reference) estimates the developmental age of samples based on their gene expression profiles.

name: MGEScan
one_line_profile: System for identifying retrotransposons in genomes
detailed_description: MGEScan is a Galaxy-based system designed to identify mobile genetic elements, specifically retrotransposons, within genomic sequences.

name: FASSO
one_line_profile: Functional Annotations using Sequence and Structure Orthology
detailed_description: FASSO is a tool for generating functional annotations by leveraging both sequence and structural orthology information.

name: AlphaMap
one_line_profile: Visual annotation of proteomics data
detailed_description: An open-source Python package for the visual annotation of proteomics data, integrating sequence-specific knowledge.

name: PROST
one_line_profile: Protein Ortholog Search Tool for remote homologs
detailed_description: PROST (PRotein Ortholog Search Tool) is a deep learning-based tool designed to detect remote homologs and orthologs accurately and quickly.

name: GAAS
one_line_profile: Genome Assembly and Annotation Service utilities
detailed_description: A collection of scripts and tools used for the Genome Assembly and Annotation Service, providing various utilities for bioinformatics analysis.

name: NBIS Annotation Pipelines
one_line_profile: Nextflow workflows for Genome Annotation
detailed_description: A set of reproducible workflows written in Nextflow for performing genome annotation tasks.

name: GDAN-TMP Models
one_line_profile: Cancer subtype prediction models and tools
detailed_description: Containerized tools and models for predicting cancer subtypes based on gene expression, miRNA, DNA methylation, and other genomic data.

name: CLEAN-Contact
one_line_profile: Enzyme functional annotation with structural inference
detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of a contrastive learning-enabled method for enzyme functional annotation prediction that incorporates structural inference.

name: Mantis
one_line_profile: Protein sequence annotation system
detailed_description: Mantis is a standalone tool for annotating protein sequences, integrating multiple reference data sources for comprehensive functional prediction.

name: BuscoOrthoPhylo
one_line_profile: Pipeline for BUSCO-based phylogenetic analysis
detailed_description: A wrapper script to automate the process of concatenating, aligning, and constructing phylogenetic trees from BUSCO results.

name: FunFinder_Pangenome
one_line_profile: Pangenome analysis of functional annotations
detailed_description: Tools for analyzing Funannotate and Orthofinder outputs in the context of pangenome results.

name: PSALM
one_line_profile: Protein sequence annotation using hierarchical language models
detailed_description: A tool leveraging protein language models to annotate protein sequences with functional properties, aiming to overcome limitations of alignment-based methods.

name: CNView
one_line_profile: Visualization and annotation of Copy Number Variants (CNVs)
detailed_description: A tool for the visualization and annotation of CNVs from population-scale whole-genome sequencing data, facilitating the interpretation of structural variations.

name: HRIBO
one_line_profile: High-throughput annotation workflow for bacterial Ribo-seq data
detailed_description: A workflow for reproducible analysis of bacterial Ribo-seq data, performing pre-processing, QC, and annotation-independent ORF prediction.

name: SwiftOrtho
one_line_profile: High performance tool for ortholog and paralog identification
detailed_description: A tool designed to identify orthologs and paralogs across genomes efficiently, supporting comparative genomics studies.

name: Pynteny
one_line_profile: Synteny-aware HMM search tool for sequence databases
detailed_description: A tool to query sequence databases using Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) arranged in predefined synteny structures, aiding in the discovery of gene clusters.

name: VirMake
one_line_profile: Viral metagenomic data analysis pipeline
detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline for viral metagenomic data analysis, offering taxonomic and functional annotation with HPC support.

name: gcap
one_line_profile: Gene-level Circular Amplicon Prediction from WES data
detailed_description: A tool to detect extrachromosomal DNA (ecDNA) amplifications from whole-exome sequencing (WES) data and copy number profiles.

name: ANNOgesic
one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA-Seq based annotation tool for bacteria/archaea
detailed_description: A modular pipeline for correcting and enriching genome annotations using RNA-Seq data, specifically designed for bacterial and archaeal genomes.

name: LipidLynxX
one_line_profile: Lipid annotation conversion and functional analysis tool
detailed_description: A tool to convert, cross-match, and link lipid annotations to ontologies and pathways, facilitating systems-wide integration of lipidome dynamics.

name: neofox
one_line_profile: Neoantigen annotation and prioritization tool
detailed_description: A tool for annotating mutated peptide sequences with potential neoantigen descriptors to aid in cancer immunotherapy research.

name: franklin
one_line_profile: DNA sequence annotation tool
detailed_description: A tool designed for DNA sequence annotation, likely providing a user interface or command line utility for annotating genomic features.

name: BATH
one_line_profile: Better Alignments with Translated HMMER
detailed_description: A tool that improves sequence alignments by using translated HMMER searches, useful for detecting remote homologies.

name: ksrates
one_line_profile: Whole-genome duplication positioning tool
detailed_description: A tool to position whole-genome duplications relative to speciation events using substitution-rate-adjusted mixed paralog-ortholog Ks distributions.

name: ICAnet
one_line_profile: Independent Component Analysis for cell clustering and annotation
detailed_description: A method using Independent Component Analysis to decipher functional modules for improved cell clustering and annotation in single-cell data.

name: TFTF
one_line_profile: Transcription Factor Target Finder
detailed_description: An R package for predicting transcription factor target genes and identifying upstream transcription factors of target genes.

name: DRAM
one_line_profile: Distilled and Refined Annotation of Metabolism
detailed_description: A tool for the annotation and curation of function for microbial and viral genomes, focusing on metabolic profiling.

name: EGN
one_line_profile: Exemplar Guided Deep Neural Network for Spatial Transcriptomics
detailed_description: A deep learning model for predicting gene expression in spatial transcriptomics analysis.

name: MAKER
one_line_profile: Portable and easily configurable genome annotation pipeline
detailed_description: A widely used pipeline for genome annotation that integrates evidence from multiple sources (ESTs, proteins, ab initio predictors) to annotate eukaryotic genomes.

name: Immuannot
one_line_profile: Immunological gene typing and annotation tool
detailed_description: A tool specifically designed for the typing and annotation of immunological genes in genome assemblies.

name: mclSTExp
one_line_profile: Multimodal Contrastive Learning for Spatial Gene Expression Prediction
detailed_description: A deep learning tool using histology images and contrastive learning to predict spatial gene expression.

name: BioAider
one_line_profile: Desktop platform for viral genome annotation and mutation analysis
detailed_description: A desktop application for quick sequence annotation and mutation analysis, optimized for large-scale viral genome sequencing data.

name: hpcleap_dnds
one_line_profile: Sliding window dN/dS vs functional domain comparison tool
detailed_description: A tool to compare selective pressures (dN/dS) acting along protein sequences against functional protein domain annotations.

name: graphcast-predict
one_line_profile: Prediction wrapper for GraphCast weather model
detailed_description: A tool/script to facilitate making weather predictions using the GraphCast AI model with CDS and pysolar data.

name: deepSimDEF
one_line_profile: Deep learning models for functional analysis of genes
detailed_description: A tool offering deep learning models for functional analysis of genes using Gene Ontology annotations of gene products.

name: ORFanage
one_line_profile: ORF search tool for spliced genomes guided by reference annotation
detailed_description: An efficient method to search for Open Reading Frames (ORFs) in spliced genomes, using reference annotations to maximize protein similarity.

name: ORF-RATER
one_line_profile: Regression-based annotation of protein-coding sequences from ribosome profiling
detailed_description: A tool for annotating protein-coding sequences using regression models on ribosome profiling data.

name: genofan
one_line_profile: Functional annotation workflow for bacterial genomes
detailed_description: A workflow designed for the functional annotation of sets of bacterial genomes.

name: pyaragorn
one_line_profile: Python bindings for ARAGORN tRNA finder
detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to ARAGORN, a tool for detecting tRNA and tmRNA genes.

name: pyhmmer
one_line_profile: Python bindings for HMMER3
detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to HMMER3, enabling efficient sequence analysis and profile HMM searches within Python.

name: pyrodigal
one_line_profile: Python bindings for Prodigal ORF finder
detailed_description: Cython bindings and Python interface to Prodigal, a popular gene prediction tool for prokaryotic genomes and metagenomes.

name: phylogenomics_pipeline
one_line_profile: Pipeline for phylogenomic inference using single copy genes
detailed_description: A pipeline that uses single copy nuclear genes and 4DTv sites to infer phylogenies between related taxa after gene family clustering.

name: distillR
one_line_profile: R package for distilling functional annotations
detailed_description: An R package designed to distill and summarize functional annotations of bacterial genomes and metagenomes.

name: prodigal-gv
one_line_profile: Gene calling tool optimized for giant viruses and alternative genetic codes
detailed_description: A fork of the Prodigal gene prediction tool, specifically modified to improve gene calling performance for giant viruses (NCLDVs) and viruses utilizing alternative genetic codes.

name: rhmmer
one_line_profile: R interface utilities for the HMMER sequence analysis suite
detailed_description: A collection of R utilities designed to facilitate working with HMMER, allowing users to parse HMMER output and integrate profile HMM searches into R-based bioinformatics workflows.

name: Batch-Fasta-Interpro
one_line_profile: Batch processing utility for InterProScan via EBI web services
detailed_description: A Python tool to submit multi-sequence FASTA files to the EBI InterProScan web service, enabling batch functional annotation of protein sequences without local installation of the full InterProScan database.

name: ggCaller
one_line_profile: Graph-based gene caller for bacterial population genomics
detailed_description: A gene calling and annotation tool that works directly on Bifrost graphs (colored de Bruijn graphs), enabling consistent gene finding and clustering across population-scale bacterial datasets without individual assembly.

name: GEAN
one_line_profile: Toolkit for comparing genomic sequences and annotations
detailed_description: A toolkit designed to handle genomic sequence and genome structure annotation files, facilitating comparison and analysis between inbreeding lines and species.

name: assembly-annotation-pipeline
one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for plant genome assembly and annotation
detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow for plant genomics that automates the process of genome assembly and subsequent structural and functional annotation.

name: micronota
one_line_profile: Annotation pipeline for microbial genomes and metagenomes
detailed_description: A customizable pipeline for annotating microbial genomes and metagenomic assemblies, integrating various tools to predict features and assign functions.

name: braker-docker
one_line_profile: Docker container for the BRAKER gene prediction pipeline
detailed_description: A containerized deployment of the BRAKER gene finder, facilitating the setup and execution of eukaryotic gene prediction workflows.

name: RESCRIPt
one_line_profile: Reference sequence annotation and curation pipeline for QIIME 2
detailed_description: A QIIME 2 plugin for processing, annotating, and curating reference sequence databases (like SILVA or Greengenes) for use in microbiome taxonomy classification.

name: BLEEP
one_line_profile: Bi-modal contrastive learning for spatial gene expression prediction
detailed_description: A deep learning framework that predicts spatially resolved gene expression profiles directly from H&E histology images using bi-modal contrastive learning.

name: abstar
one_line_profile: Scalable antibody sequence annotation and VDJ assignment
detailed_description: A tool for VDJ germline assignment and functional annotation of antibody (BCR) sequences, capable of scaling from single sequences to billions of reads.

name: ABC-Enhancer-Gene-Prediction
one_line_profile: Activity-by-Contact model for enhancer-gene connection prediction
detailed_description: A tool to predict cell-type specific enhancer-gene connections using the Activity-by-Contact (ABC) model, integrating chromatin accessibility and histone modification data.

name: covviz
one_line_profile: Interactive multi-sample genome coverage visualizer
detailed_description: A visualization tool designed to display genome coverage across multiple samples, helping to identify coverage anomalies alongside annotations and metadata.

name: GeneFinder.jl
one_line_profile: Gene finding framework for the Julia language
detailed_description: A Julia package providing algorithms and utilities for identifying coding regions (ORFs) and predicting genes in genomic sequences.

name: QTG_Finder
one_line_profile: Prioritization tool for QTL causal genes
detailed_description: A machine learning-based tool to prioritize candidate causal genes within Quantitative Trait Loci (QTL) regions, aiding in the identification of genes responsible for phenotypic traits.

name: TargetPred
one_line_profile: Prediction of therapeutic targets from gene-disease associations
detailed_description: An R package for the in silico prediction of novel therapeutic targets by analyzing gene-disease association data.

name: Target-Prediction-Crawler
one_line_profile: Crawler for molecular target prediction databases
detailed_description: A tool to automatically crawl and standardize target information from various molecular target prediction websites (SwissTargetPrediction, SEA, SuperPred), facilitating data acquisition for drug discovery.

name: CHAP
one_line_profile: Functional annotation of ion channel structures
detailed_description: The Channel Annotation Package (CHAP) is a tool for the functional annotation of ion channel structures, analyzing pore dimensions and hydrophobicity.

name: A-pro
one_line_profile: ASTRAL extension for paralogs and orthologs
detailed_description: A software tool extending ASTRAL to handle multi-copy gene family trees, enabling species tree inference using both paralogs and orthologs.

name: jannovar
one_line_profile: Variant annotation and functional impact prediction
detailed_description: A Java-based tool and library for annotating VCF variants with functional impact information and data from various genomic databases.

name: lep_fusion_fission_finder
one_line_profile: Detection of chromosome fusion/fission events in Lepidoptera
detailed_description: A tool to identify chromosomal fusion and fission events and assign ancestral linkage units in Lepidopteran genomes using BUSCO genes as markers.

name: CancerTypePrediction
one_line_profile: CNN models for cancer type prediction from gene expression
detailed_description: Implementation of Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) models designed to predict cancer types based on gene expression data.

name: nf-ncov-voc
one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for SARS-CoV-2 mutation profiling
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for generating mutation profiles of SARS-CoV-2 or Mpox genomes, designed to work with VIRUS-MVP for visualization.

name: TE-Aid
one_line_profile: Helper tool for transposable element curation
detailed_description: A tool designed to assist in the manual curation and annotation of transposable element (TE) consensus sequences.

name: CellFunTopic
one_line_profile: Functional annotation for single-cell transcriptomics
detailed_description: A tool for the functional annotation of single-cell transcriptomics data, likely using topic modeling or similar approaches to identify functional states.

name: PhyloGeneious
one_line_profile: HPC-optimized orthology inference tool
detailed_description: A tool for orthology inference optimized for High Performance Computing (HPC) environments, facilitating large-scale phylogenetic analyses.

name: MicrobeAnnotator
one_line_profile: Metabolic annotation pipeline for microbial genomes
detailed_description: A user-friendly pipeline for the comprehensive metabolic annotation of microbial genomes and metagenomes, utilizing databases like KEGG and RefSeq.

name: LncADeep

name: afra

detailed_description: A browser-based tool for community curation and editing of genome annotations, designed to be accessible ('Genome Annotation for the Masses').

name: hmmer-rs
one_line_profile: Rust interface to HMMER
detailed_description: An ergonomic Rust library providing bindings and interfaces to the HMMER software suite for sequence analysis.

name: possvm-orthology
one_line_profile: Ortholog clustering in phylogenies
detailed_description: A tool to find clusters of orthologs in phylogenies using species overlap and MCL clustering, aiding in phylogenetic analysis.

name: csORF-finder
