detailed_description: A tool designed for identifying Open Reading Frames (ORFs) that have the ability to code for small peptides.

name: annotate_v
one_line_profile: Antibody VH and VL sequence annotation
detailed_description: A Python tool to annotate antibody variable heavy (VH) and variable light (VL) sequences, specifically identifying Framework Regions (FR) and Complementarity Determining Regions (CDR).

name: DeepMNE-CNN
one_line_profile: Deep learning model for gene function prediction
detailed_description: An implementation of a deep neural network method integrating multi-network topology for gene function prediction.

name: AnnoPred
one_line_profile: Genetic risk prediction integrating functional annotations
detailed_description: A method for genetic risk prediction that integrates Linkage Disequilibrium (LD) information and functional annotations to improve accuracy.

name: HGT-Finder
one_line_profile: Horizontal gene transfer detection tool
detailed_description: A program for identifying horizontal gene transfer events based on BLAST results.

name: GECCO
one_line_profile: Biosynthetic gene cluster prediction with CRFs
detailed_description: A tool for predicting biosynthetic gene clusters (BGCs) in genomic sequences using Conditional Random Fields (CRFs).

name: EMGNN
one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for Cancer Gene Prediction
detailed_description: An Explainable Multilayer Graph Neural Network model designed for the prediction of cancer driver genes.

name: seqminer
one_line_profile: R interface for querying genomic sequence data
detailed_description: An R package for efficiently querying and retrieving data from VCF, BCF, BGEN, and PLINK files, facilitating genomic data analysis.

name: SparsePro
one_line_profile: GWAS fine-mapping with functional annotation
detailed_description: A fine-mapping method that integrates GWAS summary statistics and functional annotation data to identify causal variants.

name: countToFPKM
one_line_profile: R package to convert RNA-seq read counts to FPKM values
detailed_description: A tool designed to convert raw read counts from RNA-seq data into Fragments Per Kilobase of transcript per Million mapped reads (FPKM), facilitating normalized gene expression analysis.

name: htseq-merge
one_line_profile: Script to merge multiple HTSeq count files into a single matrix
detailed_description: An R utility script designed to combine individual HTSeq output files into a unified read count matrix, streamlining the preparation of data for differential expression analysis.

name: RNA-seq-analysis
one_line_profile: End-to-end downstream workflow for bulk RNA-seq analysis
detailed_description: A repository maintaining a downstream analysis workflow for bulk RNA sequencing, covering steps from gene read counts to functional enrichment analysis.

name: INDEGRA
one_line_profile: Integrated suite for RNA degradation analysis and correction
detailed_description: A tool suite to compare RNA samples with different degradation levels, quantify decay rates per-transcript, and correct for degradation-induced artifacts in differential gene/transcript comparisons.

name: kallisto-qsar
one_line_profile: 3D-feature calculator for QSAR approaches
detailed_description: A Python tool to efficiently calculate 3D-features for quantitative structure-activity relationship (QSAR) approaches in cheminformatics. (Note: Distinct from the RNA-seq pseudoalignment tool 'kallisto').

name: miniQuant
one_line_profile: Tool for improving gene isoform quantification
detailed_description: A tool designed to improve the accuracy of gene isoform quantification in transcriptomics analysis.

name: AstroSleuth
one_line_profile: Astrophotography upscaler toolset
detailed_description: An open source toolset for upscaling astrophotography images, useful for processing astronomical imaging data.

name: pigx_rnaseq
one_line_profile: Pipeline for bulk RNA-seq data processing and analysis
detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for bulk RNA-seq data processing, including quality control, mapping, quantification, and downstream differential expression analysis.

name: EDec
one_line_profile: Epigenomic Deconvolution for cell type composition inference
detailed_description: A technique and tool that infers cell type composition, DNA methylation, and gene transcription profiles of constituent cell types from bulk tissue samples.

name: QEdit
one_line_profile: RNA editing quantification tool
detailed_description: A tool for quantifying RNA editing events in deep transcriptome data.

name: River
one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for differential spatial expression pattern identification
detailed_description: A Python package for identifying Differential Spatial Expression Pattern (DESP) genes using interpretable deep learning from multi-slice spatial omics data.

name: DeltaFBA
one_line_profile: Constraint-based modeling for flux distribution evaluation
detailed_description: A set of MATLAB functions that employs constraint-based modeling with differential gene expression data to evaluate changes in intracellular flux distributions.

name: SINCERITIES
one_line_profile: Gene regulatory network inference tool
detailed_description: A tool for inferring gene regulatory networks from time-stamped cross-sectional single cell transcriptional expression profiles.

name: RENEE
one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA-seq QC and quantification pipeline
detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for quality control and quantification of RNA-seq data.

name: alevin-fry
one_line_profile: Efficient single-cell transcriptomics quantification tool
detailed_description: An efficient and flexible tool for processing single-cell sequencing data, focused on single-cell transcriptomics and feature barcoding quantification.

name: oarfish
one_line_profile: Long read RNA-seq quantification tool
detailed_description: A tool designed for transcript quantification from long-read RNA-seq data.

name: cellnetr
one_line_profile: Platform to assess cell type specific gene regulatory networks
detailed_description: A network biology-based computational platform to assess the establishment of cell type specific gene regulatory networks in user-provided gene expression profiles.

name: psirc
one_line_profile: Transcript isoform reconstruction and quantification tool
detailed_description: A tool for full-length linear and circular transcript isoform reconstruction and quantification.

name: EPEE
one_line_profile: Effector and Perturbation Estimation Engine
detailed_description: A tool that conducts differential analysis of transcription factor activity from gene expression data.

name: NormalyzerDE
one_line_profile: Tool for normalization and differential expression analysis
detailed_description: A tool for normalization, evaluation of outliers, technical biases, batch effects, and differential expression analysis, applicable to omics data.

name: STAR-SEQR
one_line_profile: RNA fusion detection and quantification tool
detailed_description: A software tool for the detection and quantification of gene fusions from RNA-Seq data, developed by Expression Analysis.

name: dreamlet
one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis for multi-sample single cell datasets
detailed_description: An R package for performing differential expression analysis on multi-sample single cell datasets using linear mixed models to account for repeated measures.

name: variancePartition
one_line_profile: Quantify drivers of variation in multilevel gene expression experiments
detailed_description: An R package that quantifies and interprets drivers of variation in multilevel gene expression experiments, helping to identify sources of biological and technical variability.

name: scimilarity
one_line_profile: Unifying representation of single cell expression profiles
detailed_description: A Python tool that provides a unifying representation of single cell expression profiles to quantify similarity between expression states, generalizing to new studies without retraining.

name: bambu
one_line_profile: Long read RNA-Seq transcript discovery and quantification
detailed_description: An R package for reference-guided transcript discovery and quantification specifically designed for long-read RNA-Seq data.

name: bambu-singlecell-spatial
one_line_profile: Long read single cell and spatial transcriptomics quantification
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline extending Bambu for transcript discovery and quantification in long-read single cell and spatial transcriptomics data.

name: yanagi
one_line_profile: Transcript segment library construction for RNA-Seq quantification
detailed_description: A tool for constructing transcript segment libraries to improve RNA-Seq quantification accuracy.

name: pySpade
one_line_profile: Analysis of differential gene expression in single cell perturbations
detailed_description: A Python tool for analyzing differential gene expression in single-cell perturbation experiments (Single cell Perturbations - Analysis of Differential gene Expression).

name: DEIVA
one_line_profile: Interactive visual analysis of differential gene expression
detailed_description: A web-based tool for the interactive visual analysis of differential gene expression test results.

name: ascend
one_line_profile: Analysis of Single Cell Expression, Normalisation and Differential expression
detailed_description: An R package providing a workflow for the analysis of single cell expression data, including normalization and differential expression analysis.

name: Taxor
one_line_profile: Fast taxonomic classification of long reads
detailed_description: A fast and space-efficient tool for taxonomic classification of long DNA reads, utilizing a pseudo-mapping approach.

name: RNAseqChef
one_line_profile: Web app for automated RNA-seq differential expression analysis
detailed_description: A web application that automates systematic and integrated differential expression analysis for RNA-seq data.

name: volcano3D
one_line_profile: Interactive 3D plotting for differential expression analysis
detailed_description: An R package to plot interactive three-way differential expression analysis results in a 3D volcano plot.

name: miR-MaGiC
one_line_profile: miRNA quantification from small RNA-seq
detailed_description: A Java-based tool for the quantification of miRNA expression from small RNA-seq data.

name: CppWeightedLowess
one_line_profile: C++ implementation of limma::weightedLowess
detailed_description: A standalone C++ implementation of the weightedLowess algorithm from the limma package, used for normalization and smoothing in genomic data analysis.

name: deseq2py
one_line_profile: Python wrapper for DESeq2
detailed_description: A Python wrapper for the DESeq2 R package, designed to be compatible with Scanpy for differential expression analysis in Python workflows.

name: DEGA
one_line_profile: Python package for Differential Gene Expression Analysis
detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate differential gene expression analysis.

name: Rcount
one_line_profile: Simple and flexible RNA-Seq read counting
detailed_description: A C++ tool for simple and flexible counting of RNA-Seq reads mapping to genomic features.

name: multi_padlock_design
one_line_profile: Padlock probe design pipeline for multiplexed assays
detailed_description: A pipeline for designing padlock probes for multiplexed assays with multiple probes per target, used in cDNA-based expression profiling.

name: ReapTEC
one_line_profile: Pipeline for gene expression and enhancer activity profiling
detailed_description: A pipeline to simultaneously profile gene expression and enhancer activity in 5' scRNA-seq datasets.

name: DegNorm
one_line_profile: Normalizing RNA degradation in RNA-seq data
detailed_description: A Python package for correcting and normalizing RNA degradation effects in RNA-seq data to improve quantification accuracy.

name: SigEMD
one_line_profile: Differential gene expression analysis in single-cell RNAseq
detailed_description: An R package for differential gene expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data using a method based on the Earth Mover's Distance.

name: SpatialDecon
one_line_profile: Mixed cell deconvolution in spatial gene expression datasets
detailed_description: An R library implementing the SpatialDecon algorithm for mixed cell deconvolution in spatial gene expression datasets, also applicable to bulk expression data.

name: EQP-cluster
one_line_profile: Unix-based RNA-seq quantification pipeline
detailed_description: A Unix-based pipeline for RNA-seq quantification, developed by Novartis.

name: Corset
one_line_profile: Clustering de novo assembled transcripts and counting reads
detailed_description: Software for clustering de novo assembled transcripts and counting overlapping reads to improve quantification in de novo transcriptomics.

name: SARTools
one_line_profile: Statistical Analysis of RNA-Seq Tools
detailed_description: An R package dedicated to the statistical analysis of RNA-Seq data, providing a pipeline for differential expression analysis using DESeq2 or edgeR.

name: Cepo
one_line_profile: Uncovering cell identity genes using differential stability
detailed_description: An R package for uncovering cell identity genes using differential stability of expression in single cells.

name: GemmaDE

name: OpDEA
one_line_profile: Toolkit for optimal workflow recommendation for proteomics differential expression analysis

name: DeepDiff
one_line_profile: Deep learning model for predicting differential gene expression from histone modifications

name: YARN
one_line_profile: Robust Multi-Tissue RNA-Seq Preprocessing and Normalization

name: rRMSAnalyzer

detailed_description: A set of functions to analyze end read count data from RiboMethSeq experiments, aiding in the detection and quantification of RNA 2'-O-methylation.

name: RNA-Seq-kallisto

name: STCellbin
one_line_profile: Generating single-cell gene expression profile for spatial transcriptomics

name: Macrophage_framework
one_line_profile: Predictive framework for macrophage activation heterogeneity

name: ORNA
one_line_profile: Fast in-silico normalization algorithm for NGS data

name: Searchlight2
one_line_profile: Analysis and visualisation for bulk and pseudo-bulk RNA-seq
detailed_description: A tool for rapid analysis and visualization of bulk RNA-seq, pseudo-bulk RNA-seq, GeoMx, and Proteomic datasets.

name: TumorDecon
one_line_profile: Tumor deconvolution software for estimating cell type fractions

name: Subread
one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing next-gen sequencing data including alignment and quantification
detailed_description: The Subread software package includes the Subread aligner, Subjunc exon-exon junction detector, and featureCounts for efficient read summarization.

name: OmicVerse
one_line_profile: Python library for multi-omics analysis including bulk, single-cell and spatial RNA-seq
detailed_description: OmicVerse is a comprehensive Python library designed for the analysis of multi-omics data, supporting bulk RNA-seq, single-cell RNA-seq, and spatial transcriptomics workflows.

name: edge
one_line_profile: R package for identifying differentially expressed genes

name: IDEAS
one_line_profile: Individual level Differential Expression Analysis for Single cells

name: GEMmaker

name: readquant
one_line_profile: Package for parsing RNA-seq quantification results

name: DTUrtle
one_line_profile: Differential transcript usage (DTU) analysis of bulk or single-cell RNA-seq data

name: AIDE
one_line_profile: Annotation-assisted isoform discovery and quantification from RNA-seq data

name: TCellSI

name: bayNorm

name: outrigger

name: LineagePulse

name: Bulk_RNA-Seq_Workflow_Snakemake
one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bulk RNA-seq analysis
detailed_description: A Snakemake-based workflow integrating STAR, Cufflinks, and DESeq2 for bulk RNA-seq alignment, quantification, and differential expression analysis.

name: bulk2space
one_line_profile: Spatial deconvolution of bulk transcriptomes
detailed_description: A deep learning-based spatial deconvolution method that converts bulk transcriptomes into spatially resolved single-cell expression profiles.

name: GeneBERT

name: IsoQuant

name: GPatch
one_line_profile: Reference-guided contig assembly tool
detailed_description: A tool to assemble contigs into a chromosome-scale pseudo-assembly using alignments to a reference sequence.

name: arseq
one_line_profile: Automated RNA-seq analysis pipeline
detailed_description: An automated pipeline for RNA-seq analysis covering steps from differential expression to gene enrichment analysis.

name: DEQ

detailed_description: An R package to conveniently run DESeq2, edgeR, and QNB for the detection of differential methylation in MeRIP/m6A-seq data.

name: ballgown
one_line_profile: Isoform-level differential expression analysis

name: scMatch
one_line_profile: Single-cell gene expression profile annotation tool
detailed_description: A tool for annotating single-cell gene expression profiles by matching them to reference datasets.

name: profDGE48

detailed_description: Code base and tools for profiling highly replicated differential gene expression in RNA-seq experiments.

name: wastewater_analysis

detailed_description: A tool for estimating the abundance of SARS-CoV-2 variants in wastewater samples using RNA-Seq quantification.

name: RNASeq-Pipeline
one_line_profile: RNA-seq quantification and enrichment analysis pipeline
detailed_description: A pipeline for RNA-seq data processing, including quantification and downstream enrichment analysis.

name: MTX_model

detailed_description: An R package designed for differential expression analysis specifically in the context of metatranscriptomics data.

name: chip_seq_pipeline

detailed_description: A pipeline for ChIP-Seq data analysis with an emphasis on differential expression/binding analysis.

name: tecount
one_line_profile: Transposable element read counting tool

name: single_cell_classification

detailed_description: A set of methods to classify single cell RNA-seq data to reference profiles using either SNPs or gene expression data, developed by the Broad Institute.

name: StrainZip
one_line_profile: Unified co-assembly and pseudo-alignment tool
detailed_description: A tool for unified co-assembly and pseudo-alignment, designed to handle strain-level analysis in sequencing data.

name: powsimR

detailed_description: A flexible tool to simulate and evaluate differential expression from bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data, essential for optimizing experimental design and assessing statistical power.

name: devil

detailed_description: A tool implementing variational inference methods for analyzing differential gene expression in single-cell RNA-seq data across multiple patients.

name: SVExpress

name: RNA-Abundance-Quantification-on-UPMEM

name: dgc_predict

name: pytximport

detailed_description: A feature-rich Python implementation of the R tximport package, used for importing and summarizing transcript-level abundance estimates for gene-level analysis.

name: limma
one_line_profile: Linear Models for Microarray and RNA-seq Data

name: CSBB

detailed_description: A suite of modules for various bioinformatics tasks, including RNA-seq analysis, visualization, and data processing.

name: SplineOmics

detailed_description: An R package for time-series analysis of -omics data, utilizing spline curve fitting and limma for hypothesis testing, followed by clustering and over-representation analysis.

name: CRIES

detailed_description: A tool for counting reads mapped to intronic and exonic segments, useful for analyzing pre-mRNA and mRNA dynamics.

name: SL-quant

detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify and quantify Spliced Leader (SL) trans-splicing events from RNA-seq data.

name: FulQuant

detailed_description: A pipeline to identify and quantify transcript isoforms using Nanopore long-read sequencing data.

name: BSRPipline
one_line_profile: Analysis pipeline for Bulked Segregant RNA-Seq
detailed_description: A pipeline for the analysis of Bulked Segregant RNA-Seq (BSR-Seq) data, used for mapping genes/traits.

name: bulkrna
one_line_profile: Workflow for bulk RNA-seq pre-processing and quantification
detailed_description: A workflow developed by the Dalmolin Group for pre-processing, alignment, and quantification of bulk RNA-seq data.

name: eagle
one_line_profile: Detecting Gene-by-Environment interactions from RNA-seq

name: seqgendiff

name: rpkm_rnaseq_count

detailed_description: A script/tool to calculate RPKM (Reads Per Kilobase Million) values from RNA-seq count data.

name: isobaric-prot-wf-r

name: MetaSRA-pipeline

name: RSEM

name: GEO_microarrays
one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis of published microarray datasets from GEO
detailed_description: A Python-based tool (analyze_geo_microarrays.py) for performing differential expression analysis on microarray datasets retrieved from the NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO).

name: TRNet
one_line_profile: Neural network model for predicting drug-induced gene expression profiles

name: DrEdGE
one_line_profile: Web-based visualization tool for differential expression gene exploration
detailed_description: DrEdGE (Differential Expression Gene Explorer) is a visualization tool that allows users to interactively explore differential gene expression data, typically from RNA-seq or microarray experiments.

name: RUVSeq
one_line_profile: Remove Unwanted Variation from RNA-Seq Data

name: vennt
one_line_profile: Dynamic Venn diagrams for visualizing differential gene expression sets
detailed_description: A web-based tool for generating dynamic Venn diagrams to visualize and compare sets of differentially expressed genes, facilitating the analysis of overlaps between different experimental conditions.

name: eQTL-Catalogue RNA-seq Pipeline

detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline used by the eQTL Catalogue for the uniform processing and quantification of RNA-seq data, ensuring consistency across large-scale eQTL studies.

name: circompara2
one_line_profile: Pipeline for identification and quantification of circRNA expression
detailed_description: An improved bioinformatics pipeline that combines multiple detection methods to identify and quantify circular RNA (circRNA) expression from RNA-seq data.

name: dea_limma
one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for differential expression analysis using limma
detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module designed to perform and visualize differential expression analyses of NGS data, leveraging the statistical power of the R package limma.

name: rnaseq_pipeline
one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq data processing, quantification, and annotation
detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow and MrBiomics module for the end-to-end processing of RNA-seq data, including alignment, quantification, and feature annotation.

name: spilterlize_integrate

name: SCASA

name: tuxedo-nf

detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline implementing the classic Tuxedo suite for RNA-seq analysis, integrating HISAT for alignment, StringTie for assembly/quantification, and Ballgown for differential expression.

name: SmallSeqFlow

detailed_description: A streamlined, Jupyter notebook-based pipeline for bulk RNA-seq analysis, specifically optimized for studies with small sample sizes, offering modular extensions for custom analysis.

name: DeepGenerativeModelLINCS

name: kmerfreq

name: ideal

name: prolfqua

detailed_description: An R package providing a toolbox for differential expression analysis of omics data, with a primary focus on proteomics, including quality control, normalization, and statistical modeling.

name: gep2pep
