detailed_description: An R package for converting gene expression profiles into pathway expression profiles, facilitating pathway-level analysis and interpretation of transcriptomic data.

name: TREX
one_line_profile: Simultaneous lineage tracking and expression profiling of single cells
detailed_description: TREX (TRacking and EXpression) is a workflow for the simultaneous analysis of clonal lineage and gene expression in single cells using RNA-seq data.

name: DREEP
one_line_profile: Drug Response Estimation from single-cell Expression Profiles
detailed_description: DREEP is a computational tool designed to estimate drug response sensitivity from single-cell gene expression profiles, aiding in personalized medicine and drug discovery.

name: RNAnorm
one_line_profile: Standardized normalization of RNA-seq gene expression data
detailed_description: A Python library for normalizing RNA-seq gene expression data, implementing standard methods like TPM (Transcripts Per Million) and CPM (Counts Per Million) to ensure comparability across samples.

name: bam-readcount
one_line_profile: Utility to generate per-base read counts from BAM/CRAM files
detailed_description: A command-line utility that counts the number of reads mapping to each base at specific positions in BAM or CRAM files, useful for variant calling validation and quantification.

name: RNA-GAN
one_line_profile: Generative model for synthesizing histology images from gene expression
detailed_description: A deep generative model that synthesizes whole-slide imaging tiles conditioned on gene expression profiles, bridging transcriptomics and digital pathology.

name: iDEP
one_line_profile: Integrated Differential Expression and Pathway analysis tool
detailed_description: Source code for the iDEP web server, which provides an integrated platform for differential expression analysis, pathway enrichment, and visualization of RNA-seq and microarray data.

name: RNA_Seq_featurecounts
one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA-Seq gene counting using featureCounts
detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline for processing RNA-Seq data, specifically utilizing the featureCounts tool to generate gene count matrices from alignment files.

name: dtangle
one_line_profile: Cell type deconvolution from gene expression profiles
detailed_description: A computational method and R package for estimating cell type proportions (deconvolution) from high-throughput gene expression profiling experiments.

name: StringTie
one_line_profile: Transcript assembly and quantification for RNA-Seq
detailed_description: StringTie is a fast and efficient assembler of RNA-Seq alignments into potential transcripts. It uses a novel network flow algorithm as well as an optional de novo assembly step to assemble and quantitate full-length transcripts representing multiple splice variants for each gene locus.

name: TDM
one_line_profile: R package for normalizing RNA-seq data to match microarray distribution
detailed_description: Training Distribution Matching (TDM) is a method for normalizing RNA-seq data to make it comparable to microarray data, facilitating cross-platform machine learning and analysis.

name: GEOparse
one_line_profile: Python library to access and parse Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) data
detailed_description: GEOparse is a Python library designed to easily access, download, and parse data from the Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) database, supporting SOFT and MINiML formats.

name: rnaflow
one_line_profile: Simple RNA-Seq differential gene expression pipeline using Nextflow
detailed_description: rnaflow is a Nextflow-based pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis, focusing on differential gene expression. It automates the process from raw reads to differential expression results.

name: quanTIseq
one_line_profile: Quantification of the Tumor Immune contexture from human RNA-seq data
detailed_description: quanTIseq is a computational pipeline for the deconvolution of bulk RNA-seq data to quantify the fractions of ten different immune cell types in heterogeneous samples.

name: cellxgene_VIP
one_line_profile: Visualization in Plugin for cellxgene
detailed_description: cellxgene_VIP is a plugin for the cellxgene viewer that extends its capabilities to include advanced plotting (violin, heatmap, volcano, etc.) and differential gene expression analysis directly within the interactive interface.

name: snakemake-rnaseq
one_line_profile: RNA-seq workflow for Snakemake based on STAR and featureCounts
detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis, integrating STAR for alignment and featureCounts for quantification, providing a reproducible pipeline for gene expression analysis.

name: docker4seq
one_line_profile: Dockerized NGS computing applications for reads mapping and counting
detailed_description: docker4seq provides a collection of Docker containers wrapping common NGS tools (e.g., for mapping and counting), facilitating reproducible and portable bioinformatics analysis.

name: VERSE
one_line_profile: Versatile and efficient RNA-Seq read counting tool
detailed_description: VERSE is a standalone tool for RNA-Seq read quantification. It supports complex gene structures and various quantification modes, serving as an alternative to tools like featureCounts or htseq-count.

name: Sailfish
one_line_profile: Rapid Mapping-based Isoform Quantification from RNA-Seq Reads
detailed_description: Sailfish is an alignment-free isoform quantification tool for RNA-seq data. It uses lightweight algorithms to estimate transcript abundance rapidly without full alignment.

name: PySNAIL
one_line_profile: Smooth-quantile Normalization Adaptation for Inference of co-expression Links
detailed_description: A computational framework for inferring co-expression links using smooth-quantile normalization adaptation, specifically designed for biological network analysis.

name: Tomographer
one_line_profile: Spatial image reconstruction from read counts
detailed_description: Implements mathematical spatial image reconstruction of any set of read counts, enabling spatial transcriptomics analysis from sequencing data.

name: latch-verified/bulk-rnaseq
one_line_profile: Bulk RNA-seq analysis workflow on Latch
detailed_description: A verified workflow for bulk RNA-seq analysis, providing a standardized pipeline for processing and quantifying RNA-seq data.

name: derfinder
one_line_profile: Annotation-agnostic differential expression analysis
detailed_description: An R package for annotation-agnostic differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data, operating at expressed regions-level or single base-level.

name: SGSeq
one_line_profile: Splice event prediction and quantification
detailed_description: An R package for predicting and quantifying splice events from RNA-seq data, focusing on splicing analysis.

name: derfinder (leekgroup)
one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data
detailed_description: R package for DER Finder, a method for differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data (canonical repository).

name: recount
one_line_profile: Access to recount2 project RNA-seq data
detailed_description: R package for accessing and analyzing data from the recount2 project, facilitating the use of uniformly processed RNA-seq data.

name: regionReport
one_line_profile: HTML report generator for genomic regions
detailed_description: Generates HTML reports for a set of genomic regions or DESeq2/edgeR results, aiding in the visualization and exploration of differential expression analysis.

name: BamQuery
one_line_profile: Peptide-specific RNA-seq quantification
detailed_description: Provides RNA-seq quantification for a given peptide (8-11 residues) in chosen RNA-seq samples, bridging proteomics and transcriptomics.

name: EBSeq
one_line_profile: RNA-Seq Differential Expression Analysis
detailed_description: An R package for differential expression analysis of RNA-seq data, using an empirical Bayesian approach.

name: circMeta
one_line_profile: Circular RNA annotation and DE analysis
detailed_description: A unified computational framework for genomic feature annotation and differential expression analysis specifically for circular RNAs.

name: URSM
one_line_profile: Unified RNA Sequencing Model
detailed_description: A Unified RNA Sequencing Model (URSM) for joint analysis of single cell and bulk RNA-seq data.

name: ggvolc
one_line_profile: Volcano plots for differential expression
detailed_description: An R package to easily generate informative volcano plots from differential expression datasets and RNA-seq data.

name: piquant
one_line_profile: Transcript quantification assessment pipeline
detailed_description: A pipeline to assess the accuracy and performance of transcript quantification tools.

name: conquer
one_line_profile: Consistent quantification of external RNA-seq data sets
detailed_description: Provides consistent quantification of external RNA-seq datasets, facilitating cross-study comparisons and meta-analyses.

name: rna-seq-qc
one_line_profile: RNA-seq pipeline from FASTQ to DE
detailed_description: A comprehensive RNA-seq pipeline handling steps from FASTQ processing to differential expression analysis.

name: DOLPHIN
one_line_profile: Deep learning for single-cell RNA-seq quantification
detailed_description: Advances single-cell RNA-seq analysis beyond gene-level by integrating exon-level quantification and junction reads with deep neural networks.

name: MERFISHTools
one_line_profile: Bayesian framework for MERFISH data analysis
detailed_description: Implements a Bayesian framework for accurately predicting gene or transcript expression from MERFISH data and performing differential expression analysis.

name: zinbwave-deseq2
one_line_profile: Workflow integrating ZINB-WaVE and DESeq2 for single-cell RNA-seq analysis
detailed_description: A workflow script demonstrating the integration of ZINB-WaVE (Zero-Inflated Negative Binomial-Based Wanted Variation Extraction) with DESeq2 for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data.

name: MindSpore
one_line_profile: Deep learning framework supporting scientific computing and AI4S
detailed_description: An open-source deep learning training and inference framework. While general-purpose, it is a key platform for AI for Science (AI4S) applications, offering specific support for scientific modeling and high-performance computing.

name: Telescope
one_line_profile: Tool for quantification of transposable element expression from RNA-seq
detailed_description: A computational tool designed to accurately quantify the expression of transposable elements (TEs) in RNA-seq experiments, handling multi-mapping reads to resolve TE ambiguity.

name: SPEED2
one_line_profile: Inference of upstream pathway activity from differential gene expression
detailed_description: A tool to infer upstream signaling pathway activity based on differential gene expression signatures, helping to link gene expression changes to signaling mechanisms.

name: QAPA
one_line_profile: Quantification of Alternative Polyadenylation from RNA-seq data
detailed_description: A tool for the quantification of alternative polyadenylation (APA) from standard RNA-seq data, enabling the analysis of 3' UTR usage changes.

name: htseq-tools
one_line_profile: Collection of scripts for high-throughput sequencing data analysis
detailed_description: A repository hosting various scripts and tools for the analysis of high-throughput sequencing data, developed by the MPG Age Bioinformatics group.

name: BSDE
one_line_profile: Single-cell RNA-seq differential expression analysis approach
detailed_description: A method for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data, specifically designed for case-control studies.

name: denovo-rnaseq
one_line_profile: Workflow for de novo assembly and differential gene expression
detailed_description: A workflow for de novo transcriptome assembly, annotation, and differential gene expression analysis, suitable for organisms without a reference genome.

name: GlimmaV2
one_line_profile: Interactive graphics for differential expression analysis
detailed_description: An R/JavaScript package that generates interactive plots (like MD plots and volcano plots) for exploring differential expression analysis results.

name: pipeline-transcriptome-de
one_line_profile: Nanopore pipeline for differential gene expression and transcript usage
detailed_description: A pipeline developed by Nanopore Tech for analyzing long-read RNA-seq data to perform differential gene expression (DGE) and differential transcript usage (DTU) analysis.

name: NASQAR
one_line_profile: Web platform for high-throughput sequencing data analysis and visualization
detailed_description: A web-based platform that provides a user-friendly interface for analyzing and visualizing high-throughput sequencing data, including RNA-seq analysis tools.

name: deseq2shiny
one_line_profile: Web-based Shiny application wrapper for DESeq2
detailed_description: An R Shiny application that provides a graphical user interface for the DESeq2 package, facilitating differential expression analysis for users without coding experience.

name: TPMCalculator
one_line_profile: Quantification of mRNA abundance directly from BAM alignments
detailed_description: A tool that quantifies mRNA abundance (TPM values) directly from alignment files (BAM) by parsing the alignments and gene annotations.

name: nf-core/circrna
one_line_profile: Pipeline for circRNA quantification and differential expression
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for the identification, quantification, and differential expression analysis of circular RNAs (circRNAs) from RNA-seq data, including miRNA target prediction.

name: nf-core/differentialabundance
one_line_profile: Pipeline for differential abundance analysis of omics data
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for performing differential abundance analysis on feature/observation matrices, suitable for RNA-seq counts and other omics data.

name: nf-core/dualrnaseq
one_line_profile: Pipeline for Dual RNA-seq analysis of host-pathogen interactions
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the analysis of Dual RNA-seq data, enabling simultaneous interrogation of host and pathogen transcriptomes.

name: DGEvistools
one_line_profile: R package for visualizing DESeq2 results
detailed_description: A small R package providing functions to visualize differential gene expression (DGE) results downstream of DESeq2 analysis.

name: rna-seq-salmon-deseq2
one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-Seq using Salmon and DESeq2
detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for performing differential transcript analysis on RNA-Seq data, utilizing Salmon for quantification and DESeq2 for statistical analysis.

name: crispr_screen
one_line_profile: Differential Expression and Gene Aggregation for CRISPR screens
detailed_description: A tool written in Rust for efficient differential expression analysis and gene aggregation specifically for CRISPR screen data.

name: cTRAP
one_line_profile: Identification of causal perturbations from differential gene expression
detailed_description: An R package to identify candidate causal perturbations (e.g., drugs, gene knockdowns) by comparing differential gene expression results with CMap/LINCS data.

name: rna-seq-diff-exprn
one_line_profile: Comprehensive RNA-Seq differential expression analysis pipeline
detailed_description: A pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis that performs genome coverage calculation, differential expression (DESeq, NOISeq), structural variant detection, and differential exon usage analysis.

name: Anomalib
one_line_profile: Deep learning library for anomaly detection
detailed_description: A deep learning library for anomaly detection, providing state-of-the-art algorithms. While general-purpose, it is widely applicable in scientific data analysis (e.g., detecting defects or outliers in experimental data).

name: kallisto-transcriptome-indices
one_line_profile: Pre-built reference transcriptome indices for kallisto
detailed_description: A collection of pre-built reference transcriptome indices for popular organisms, designed for use with the kallisto quantification tool.

name: kb_python
one_line_profile: Python wrapper for the kallisto | bustools single-cell RNA-seq workflow
detailed_description: A Python wrapper that provides a convenient interface for running the kallisto | bustools workflow, facilitating the pre-processing of single-cell RNA-seq data.

name: sleuth
one_line_profile: Differential analysis of RNA-Seq data
detailed_description: A tool for the differential analysis of RNA-Seq data that utilizes bootstrap quantification estimates from kallisto to improve accuracy.

name: EMSAR
one_line_profile: Transcript quantification from RNA-seq data
detailed_description: EMSAR quantifies transcripts from RNA-seq data, focusing on accurate estimation of isoform abundance.

name: RankCompV3.jl
one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis based on relative expression orderings
detailed_description: A differential expression analysis algorithm implemented in Julia that uses relative expression orderings (REOs) of gene pairs to identify differences.

name: GenExVis
one_line_profile: Visualization tool for differential gene expression data
detailed_description: An application designed for exploring and visualizing differential gene expression data generated by DESeq2.

name: r-peridot
one_line_profile: GUI software for Differential Gene Expression analysis
detailed_description: Software providing an intuitive interface for performing Differential Gene Expression (DGE) analysis on Windows and Linux, leveraging R packages.

name: DE_rpy2
one_line_profile: Python implementation of DESeq2, edgeR, and limma via rpy2
detailed_description: A Python-based implementation for differential expression analysis that wraps standard R tools like DESeq2, edgeR, and limma using rpy2.

name: pipeline-nanopore-ref-isoforms
one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating genomes using long read transcriptomics
detailed_description: A pipeline for annotating genomes using long-read transcriptomics data, utilizing tools like StringTie.

name: SCALPEL
one_line_profile: Isoform usage and APA quantification from scRNA-seq
detailed_description: A Nextflow-based pipeline for the quantification of isoform usage and alternative polyadenylation (APA) events from single-cell RNA-seq data.

name: rnadeseq
one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA-seq differential expression and pathway analysis
detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for performing differential gene expression analysis and subsequent pathway analysis on RNA-seq data.

name: scProjection
one_line_profile: Projecting RNA measurements onto single cell atlases
detailed_description: A tool for projecting RNA measurements onto single cell atlases to extract cell type-specific expression profiles.

name: edgePy
one_line_profile: Python implementation of edgeR
detailed_description: A Python implementation of the popular R package edgeR for differential expression analysis of count data.

name: spladder
one_line_profile: Detection and quantification of alternative splicing events
detailed_description: A tool for the detection and quantification of alternative splicing events from RNA-Seq data, enabling detailed splicing analysis.

name: SCnorm
one_line_profile: Normalization for single cell RNA-seq data
detailed_description: An R package for the normalization of single-cell RNA-seq data, addressing the specific noise characteristics of scRNA-seq.

name: Trendy
one_line_profile: Segmented regression analysis of expression dynamics
detailed_description: A tool for segmented regression analysis of expression dynamics for high-throughput ordered profiling experiments.

name: RNASeqDEPipeline
one_line_profile: RNA-Seq differential gene expression pipeline
detailed_description: A pipeline designed to automate the process of differential gene expression analysis from RNA-Seq data.

name: CardioPipeLine
one_line_profile: Pipeline for RNA-seq analysis
detailed_description: A pipeline specifically designed for RNA-seq analysis, likely tailored for cardiovascular research contexts given the name.

name: bcbio.rnaseq
one_line_profile: Quality control and differential expression analysis for bcbio RNA-seq
detailed_description: A toolset for quality control, differential gene/transcript expression, and pathway analysis for bcbio RNA-seq runs.

name: Core-SNP-filter
one_line_profile: Filter sites in whole-genome pseudo-alignment
detailed_description: A tool to filter sites in a FASTA-format whole-genome pseudo-alignment, useful for SNP analysis.

name: strawberry
one_line_profile: Genome-guided transcript reconstruction and quantification
detailed_description: A program for fast and accurate genome-guided transcript reconstruction and quantification from RNA-seq data, supporting PacBio single-end reads.

name: BEDwARS
one_line_profile: Bayesian deconvolution of bulk expression profiles
detailed_description: A Bayesian approach to deconvolving bulk expression profiles using noisy reference expression profiles of constituent cell types.

name: PyDESeq2
one_line_profile: Python implementation of the DESeq2 pipeline for bulk RNA-seq differential expression analysis
detailed_description: A Python library that implements the DESeq2 method for differential expression analysis of bulk RNA-seq data, enabling statistical testing of count data in Python-based bioinformatics workflows.

name: allelecounter
one_line_profile: Tool for counting reads mapping to reference or alternate alleles at heterozygous SNPs
detailed_description: A Python utility designed to generate allele-specific read counts from sequencing data, primarily used for allele-specific expression (ASE) analysis and variant validation.

name: HTSeq
one_line_profile: Library for processing and analysis of high-throughput sequencing data
detailed_description: A Python library and set of command-line tools for analyzing high-throughput sequencing data, widely used for counting reads in features (htseq-count) and processing SAM/BAM files.

name: slowkow/snakefiles
one_line_profile: Collection of Snakemake workflows for RNA-seq data analysis
detailed_description: A repository of reusable Snakemake workflow definitions for common RNA-seq analysis tasks, including alignment (STAR) and quantification (Kallisto), serving as a template for reproducible research.

name: rna-seq-star-deseq2
one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for RNA-seq analysis with STAR and DESeq2
detailed_description: A standardized Snakemake workflow for performing RNA-seq analysis, including read alignment with STAR and differential expression analysis with DESeq2.

name: single-cell-rna-seq
one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for single-cell RNA-seq analysis
detailed_description: A comprehensive Snakemake workflow for single-cell RNA-seq data analysis, covering quality control, highly variable gene identification, cell type assignment, and differential expression.

name: tradeSeq
one_line_profile: Trajectory-based differential expression analysis for sequencing data
detailed_description: An R package for analyzing gene expression changes along cellular trajectories in single-cell RNA-seq data, allowing for the discovery of genes that are differentially expressed between lineages or along time.

name: diffxpy
one_line_profile: Differential expression analysis framework for single-cell RNA-seq data
detailed_description: A Python package for differential expression analysis in single-cell RNA-seq data, supporting various statistical tests and handling complex experimental designs.

name: DESeq2
one_line_profile: Differential gene expression analysis based on the negative binomial distribution
detailed_description: A standard R/Bioconductor package for differential expression analysis of count data (RNA-seq) using shrinkage estimation for dispersions and fold changes.

name: rnaseqGene
one_line_profile: End-to-end RNA-seq workflow for exploratory analysis and differential expression
detailed_description: A Bioconductor workflow package providing a complete pipeline for RNA-seq analysis, including data import, quality assessment, and differential expression using DESeq2.

name: tximeta
one_line_profile: Transcript quantification import with automatic metadata detection
detailed_description: An R package that facilitates the import of transcript quantification data (from Salmon/alevin) while automatically attaching transcript metadata and annotation.

name: tximport
one_line_profile: Import and summarization of transcript-level estimates for gene-level analysis
detailed_description: An R package for importing transcript-level abundance estimates from quantification tools (Salmon, Kallisto, RSEM) and summarizing them for gene-level differential expression analysis.

name: tidybulk
one_line_profile: Tidyverse-compliant framework for bulk RNA-seq analysis
detailed_description: An R package that brings bulk and pseudobulk transcriptomics data analysis into the 'tidy' data paradigm, facilitating manipulation and visualization.

name: Whippet.jl
one_line_profile: High-speed RNA-seq quantification at the splicing event level
detailed_description: A Julia package for fast and lightweight RNA-seq quantification, focusing on splicing events and isoform complexity.

name: vcf2msa.py
one_line_profile: Utility to generate multiple sequence alignments from VCF files
detailed_description: A Python script/package to create pseudo-reference multiple sequence alignments by applying VCF variants to a reference genome.

name: kmtricks
one_line_profile: Modular k-mer counting and Bloom filter construction tool
detailed_description: A C++ tool for constructing k-mer count matrices and Bloom filters from large collections of sequencing reads, useful for metagenomics and comparative genomics.

name: deldenoiser
one_line_profile: Denoising tool for DNA-encoded library (DEL) read count data
detailed_description: A Python tool to remove the effects of truncated side-products from read count data in DNA-encoded library screens.

name: tucca-rna-seq
one_line_profile: RNA-Seq workflow for quantification and differential expression
detailed_description: A workflow for RNA-seq analysis including read quantification, differential expression analysis, and pathway enrichment.

name: pseudoBulk
one_line_profile: Cluster-specific pseudo-bulk analysis for scRNA-seq
detailed_description: A tool to perform cluster-specific pseudo-bulk analysis of 10X single-cell RNA-seq data, connecting Seurat clusters to RNA-seq pipelines.

name: sc_read_kallisto_wrapper
one_line_profile: Wrapper for single-cell transcriptomics pipeline using Kallisto
detailed_description: A wrapper script/pipeline for processing single-cell transcriptomics data using Kallisto for pseudoalignment and quantification.

name: Pymportx
one_line_profile: Fast gene count estimation from pseudoalignment outputs
detailed_description: A Python package for estimating gene counts from transcript quantification files generated by tools like Salmon or Kallisto.

name: Subread_to_DEXSeq
one_line_profile: Converter for FeatureCounts output to DEXSeq format
detailed_description: Scripts to facilitate the import of FeatureCounts (Subread) output into DEXSeq for differential exon usage analysis.

name: SPLICE-q
one_line_profile: Genome-wide splicing efficiency quantification tool
detailed_description: A Python tool for quantifying genome-wide splicing efficiency from RNA-seq data.

name: sam2counts
one_line_profile: Count mapped reads per reference from SAM files
detailed_description: A utility to count the number of mapped reads for each reference sequence in a SAM file, useful for simple RNA-Seq quantification.

name: LIMMA-pipeline-proteomics
one_line_profile: LIMMA pipeline for proteomic differential expression
detailed_description: An R pipeline using LIMMA (empirical Bayes method) for two-group comparison in proteomic experiments.

name: diffexpr
one_line_profile: Python interface for DESeq2 via rpy2
detailed_description: A Python package that ports DESeq2 functionality into Python using rpy2, allowing Python users to run DESeq2 differential expression analysis.

name: DEA.R
one_line_profile: Automated differential expression analysis script
detailed_description: An R script to automate differential expression analysis using popular methods like DESeq2, edgeR, or limma-voom.

name: RNA-seq-pipeline
one_line_profile: Shell pipeline for RNA-seq expression and variant analysis
detailed_description: A shell-based pipeline integrating STAR, RSEM, and GATK for analyzing gene expression and calling variants from RNA-seq data.

name: ThreeDRNAseq
one_line_profile: Pipeline for differential expression and alternative splicing
detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline for differential expression (DE) and differential alternative splicing (DAS) analysis using RNA-seq data.

name: CircAST
one_line_profile: Circular RNA full-length assembly and quantification tool
detailed_description: A computational tool designed for the full-length assembly and quantification of circular RNAs (circRNAs) using RNA-Seq data.

name: GSFA
one_line_profile: Sparse factor analysis for single-cell CRISPR screens
detailed_description: An R package for simultaneous sparse factor analysis and differential gene expression discovery in single-cell CRISPR screening data.

name: DislncRF
one_line_profile: Inference of disease-associated lncRNAs from tissue expression
detailed_description: A tool for inferring disease-associated long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) using tissue expression profiles.

name: iDEA
one_line_profile: Integrative Differential Expression and Analysis for scRNA-seq
detailed_description: A framework for differential expression (DE) and gene set enrichment analysis (GSEA) tailored for single-cell RNA-seq studies.

name: DEqMS
one_line_profile: Statistical method for quantitative proteomic analysis
detailed_description: An R package for differential expression analysis in quantitative proteomics, improving estimation accuracy by modeling the dependence of variance on peptide count.

name: normpy
one_line_profile: Normalization methods for RNA-Seq expression data
detailed_description: A Python library implementing various normalization methods for RNA-Seq expression data.

name: ScanExitronLR
one_line_profile: Characterization and quantification of exitron splicing in long-read RNA-seq
detailed_description: A package for detecting and quantifying exitron splicing events specifically in long-read RNA-seq data.

name: BrassicaEDB
one_line_profile: Gene expression database and profiling platform for Brassica crops
detailed_description: A comprehensive interactive tool and database for gene expression profiling data in Brassica crops, enabling researchers to explore transcriptome levels.

name: SPROD
one_line_profile: Denoising tool for spatial transcriptomics data
detailed_description: SPROD (Spatial PROfiling De-noising) is a tool designed to correct drop-outs in spatial transcriptomics data by leveraging spatial information to improve gene expression profiling.

name: VIRTUS
one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral transcriptome detection and quantification
detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed for the detection and quantification of viral transcriptomes, taking into account splicing events.

name: VIRTUS2
one_line_profile: Updated pipeline for viral transcriptome detection and quantification
detailed_description: The second version of the VIRTUS pipeline for viral transcriptome detection and quantification, incorporating improvements in processing.

name: squab
one_line_profile: Alignment-based gene expression quantification tool
detailed_description: A Rust-based tool for quantifying gene expression from alignment data, offering performance benefits for specific quantification tasks.

name: PAQR_KAPAC
one_line_profile: Pipeline for poly(A) site quantification and motif inference
detailed_description: A suite of tools (PAQR and KAPAC) from Zavolan Lab for quantifying poly(A) site usage from RNA-seq data and inferring regulatory sequence motifs implicated in 3' end processing.

name: RNASkim
one_line_profile: Rapid method for RNA-Seq quantification at transcript level
detailed_description: A method and tool for fast RNA-Seq quantification, clustering transcripts to reduce the complexity of abundance estimation.

name: ADesigner
one_line_profile: One-shot antibody designer using Cross-Gate MLP and protein complex invariant embeddings
detailed_description: The official implementation of the AAAI'24 paper. It utilizes a Cross-Gate MLP architecture combined with protein complex invariant embeddings to perform one-shot design of antibody sequences, aiming to optimize binding affinity and specificity.

name: GENA-LM
one_line_profile: Transformer masked language model trained on human DNA sequences
detailed_description: GENA-LM is a suite of transformer-based masked language models trained on human DNA sequences (T2T-CHM13 and GRCh38). It is designed to learn rich genomic representations for downstream tasks such as promoter prediction, splice site identification, and chromatin profiling.

name: progenomes_classifier
one_line_profile: Tool to classify genomes into the specI taxonomy
detailed_description: A command-line tool designed to classify input genome sequences into the specI taxonomy framework. It aids in taxonomic profiling and identification of microbial genomes based on specific marker genes.

name: iPPIGAN
one_line_profile: De novo molecular design for PPI inhibitors using GANs
detailed_description: A deep molecular generative model framework specifically designed for creating Protein-Protein Interaction (PPI) inhibitors. It utilizes Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) to synthesize novel molecular structures optimized for targeting specific protein interfaces.

name: Genos
one_line_profile: A Genomic Foundation Model for sequence analysis
detailed_description: A genomic foundation model developed by BGI-HangzhouAI. It is designed to learn representations of genomic sequences to support various downstream bioinformatics tasks, leveraging large-scale pre-training on genomic data.

name: TMbed
one_line_profile: Transmembrane protein prediction using language model embeddings
detailed_description: A tool for predicting transmembrane proteins and their topology. It utilizes embeddings from protein language models (like ProtT5) to achieve high-accuracy predictions of transmembrane helices and signal peptides without requiring evolutionary profiles (MSAs).

name: ProRNA3D-single
one_line_profile: Single-sequence protein-RNA complex structure prediction
detailed_description: A deep learning method for predicting the 3D structure of protein-RNA complexes using only single sequences. It leverages biological language models to extract features from protein and RNA sequences for structure modeling.

name: PST
one_line_profile: Protein Structure Transformer for structure-aware embeddings
detailed_description: Protein Structure Transformer (PST) is a model designed to endow pretrained protein language models with structural knowledge. It processes protein structures to generate embeddings that capture both sequence and structural information for downstream tasks.

name: ERNIE-RNA
one_line_profile: Structure-enhanced RNA language model
detailed_description: A pre-trained RNA language model that incorporates structural information to improve RNA representation learning. It is designed to handle various RNA-related tasks by leveraging both sequence and secondary structure data.

name: protein-se3
one_line_profile: Benchmarking SE3-based generative models for protein design
detailed_description: A framework and benchmarking suite for SE(3)-equivariant generative models applied to protein structure design. It facilitates the evaluation and development of models that generate 3D protein backbones.

name: PCMol
one_line_profile: De novo molecular generator conditioned on protein embeddings
detailed_description: A multi-target molecular generation tool that conditions generation on AlphaFold's latent protein embeddings. It aims to design small molecules that bind to specific protein targets defined by their structural embeddings.

name: DeepGOA
one_line_profile: Deep learning framework for gene ontology annotation
detailed_description: A deep learning method for predicting Gene Ontology (GO) annotations. It integrates sequence information with protein-protein interaction network data to improve the accuracy of function prediction.

name: RNALoc-LM
one_line_profile: RNA language model for subcellular localization prediction
detailed_description: A pre-trained RNA language model specifically fine-tuned for predicting the subcellular localization of RNA molecules. It leverages sequence patterns learned from large-scale RNA data to predict where RNAs reside within the cell.

name: RNAErnie
one_line_profile: Motif-aware RNA language model
detailed_description: An RNA language model that incorporates motif-aware pre-training and type-guided fine-tuning. It is designed to capture both sequential and structural motif information for improved performance on various RNA analysis tasks.

name: SETH
one_line_profile: Protein disorder prediction using ProtT5 embeddings
detailed_description: A tool for residue-wise prediction of intrinsic disorder in proteins. It utilizes embeddings from the ProtT5 protein language model to predict disordered regions efficiently and accurately.

name: DNABERT-Enhancer
one_line_profile: Enhancer prediction using fine-tuned DNABERT
detailed_description: A tool based on the DNABERT model, fine-tuned specifically for the prediction of genomic enhancer regions. It also includes a generative component for creating cumulative enhancer datasets.

name: bio-transformers
one_line_profile: Wrapper for ESM and ProtBERT protein language models
detailed_description: A Python library that provides a unified interface to access and use state-of-the-art protein language models like ESM and ProtBERT. It simplifies the process of generating embeddings and computing log-likelihoods for protein sequences.

name: esm-s
one_line_profile: Structure-Informed Protein Language Model
detailed_description: A protein language model that integrates structural information into the training process. It aims to learn representations that reflect both the sequence and the 3D structure of proteins.

name: species-aware-DNA-LM
one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA language modeling
detailed_description: A DNA language model architecture that explicitly accounts for species information during training. This approach allows the model to learn species-specific genomic patterns and improve generalization across different organisms.

name: Progeni
one_line_profile: Probabilistic Knowledge Graph for Target Identification
detailed_description: A computational framework that uses a probabilistic knowledge graph to identify potential drug targets. It integrates diverse biological data to infer relationships between genes, diseases, and drugs.

name: InstructPLM
one_line_profile: Protein language model trained with structure instructions
detailed_description: A large protein language model trained to follow structural instructions. It enables controllable protein generation and modification by conditioning the model on specific structural constraints or descriptions.

name: R-ESM
one_line_profile: Evolutionary Scale Modeling for RNA
detailed_description: An adaptation of the Evolutionary Scale Modeling (ESM) architecture specifically for RNA sequences. It provides pre-trained embeddings for RNA that capture evolutionary and structural information.

name: InterPLM
one_line_profile: Interpretable features in Protein Language Models via Sparse Autoencoders
detailed_description: A toolkit for analyzing and interpreting the internal representations of protein language models. It uses sparse autoencoders to decompose embeddings into interpretable features, aiding in the understanding of what these models learn about protein biology.

name: iDNA_ABF
one_line_profile: Multi-scale deep learning model for DNA methylation prediction
detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting DNA methylation sites. It employs a multi-scale approach to capture features from DNA sequences, aiming for high accuracy and interpretability in epigenomic analysis.

name: TinyDNABERT
one_line_profile: Lightweight genomic language model
detailed_description: A compact version of the DNABERT model, designed for efficient genomic sequence analysis. It uses BPE tokenization and a RoBERTa architecture to provide genomic embeddings with lower computational resource requirements.

name: Selene
one_line_profile: Framework for training sequence-level deep learning networks
detailed_description: A PyTorch-based framework designed for developing, training, and evaluating deep learning models on biological sequences. It supports various data formats and provides tools for sequence-based prediction tasks.

name: regLM
one_line_profile: Toolkit for training hyenaDNA-based autoregressive language models
detailed_description: A toolkit developed by Genentech for training autoregressive language models on DNA sequences, specifically leveraging the Hyena operator. It is designed for generating and analyzing genomic sequences.

name: GENERanno
one_line_profile: Genomic Foundation Model for Metagenomic Annotation
detailed_description: A foundation model specifically tailored for the annotation of metagenomic data. It leverages large-scale pre-training to identify and annotate genes and functional elements in complex metagenomic samples.

name: GENERator
one_line_profile: Long-Context Generative Genomic Foundation Model
detailed_description: A generative genomic foundation model capable of handling long-context sequences. It is designed for tasks requiring the generation or completion of long DNA sequences, facilitating applications in synthetic biology and genome design.

name: HydraRNA
one_line_profile: Full-length RNA language model
detailed_description: A language model designed to process full-length RNA sequences. It aims to capture long-range dependencies and global structural features of RNA molecules for improved prediction and analysis.

name: TamGent
one_line_profile: Transformer-based generative solution for structure-based drug design
detailed_description: A generative model tailored for generating molecules that fit specific protein pockets, utilizing a Transformer architecture for structure-based drug design (SBDD).

name: protein-localization
one_line_profile: Protein subcellular localization prediction using Transformer embeddings
detailed_description: A tool leveraging Transformer-based protein embeddings and linear attention mechanisms to predict the subcellular localization of proteins with state-of-the-art accuracy.

name: HyenaDNA
one_line_profile: Long-range genomic foundation model built with Hyena operator
detailed_description: A genomic foundation model capable of handling long-range sequences (up to 1M tokens) using the Hyena operator, enabling high-resolution analysis of DNA sequences.

name: ProtFlash
one_line_profile: Lightweight protein language model for efficient embedding
detailed_description: A lightweight protein language model designed to generate effective protein representations with reduced computational cost compared to larger PLMs.

name: Cryo-MEM
one_line_profile: Membrane signal subtraction software for Cryo-EM reconstruction
detailed_description: A specialized software tool for subtracting membrane signals to facilitate high-resolution cryo-EM reconstruction of membrane proteins embedded in their native environment.

name: ReLSO
one_line_profile: Regularized Latent Space Optimization for generative protein design
detailed_description: A Transformer-based neural network framework (Regularized Latent Space Optimization) for generating highly optimized protein sequences by exploring a regularized latent space.

name: MAPE-PPI
one_line_profile: Microenvironment-aware protein embedding for PPI prediction
detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting protein-protein interactions (PPI) by incorporating microenvironment-aware protein embeddings to enhance accuracy and efficiency.

name: LucaPCycle
one_line_profile: Dual-channel model for phosphate-solubilizing protein function prediction
detailed_description: A predictive model utilizing raw sequences and protein language models to identify phosphate-solubilizing functionality and classify specific types among 31 fine-grained functions.

name: LucaVirus
one_line_profile: Unified genome-protein language model for virus analysis
detailed_description: A foundation model for modeling the evolutionary and functional landscape of viruses, integrating genomic and protein data for downstream viral analysis tasks.

name: DNABERT-2
one_line_profile: Efficient foundation model for multi-species genome analysis
detailed_description: An efficient genomic foundation model trained on multi-species genomes, serving as a benchmark and tool for various downstream DNA sequence analysis tasks.

name: DNABERT_S
one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA embedding model
detailed_description: A genomic foundation model variant focused on learning species-aware DNA embeddings to improve performance on cross-species or species-specific genomic tasks.

name: GERM
one_line_profile: Fast and low-cost genomic foundation model training via outlier removal
detailed_description: A method and tool for training genomic foundation models more efficiently by identifying and removing outliers, reducing computational costs while maintaining performance.

name: GenoArmory
one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for adversarial attacks on genomic foundation models
detailed_description: A unified framework designed to evaluate the robustness of genomic foundation models against adversarial attacks, ensuring security and reliability in genomic analysis.

name: BioNeMo Binder Design Blueprint
one_line_profile: Generative protein binder design workflow using NVIDIA BioNeMo
detailed_description: A blueprint and workflow for designing protein binders using generative AI models within the NVIDIA BioNeMo framework, facilitating computational protein engineering.

name: CodonFM
one_line_profile: Codon-resolution language models for protein-coding sequences
detailed_description: A family of language models trained on codon sequences from millions of protein-coding genes, enabling high-resolution analysis of coding regions across species.

name: PoET-2
one_line_profile: Retrieval-augmented multimodal protein language model
detailed_description: A protein language model that uses retrieval-augmented generation to improve protein sequence generation and representation learning.

name: ProLLaMA
one_line_profile: Protein Large Language Model for multi-task processing
detailed_description: A Large Language Model adapted for protein sequences, capable of performing multiple protein language processing tasks such as generation and property prediction.

name: PaccMann Generator
one_line_profile: Generative models for transcriptomic/protein-driven molecular design
detailed_description: Part of the PaccMann framework, this tool provides generative models for designing molecules based on transcriptomic or protein context, utilizing reinforcement learning.

name: PaccMann Proteomics
one_line_profile: Protein language modeling tools for the PaccMann framework
detailed_description: A component of the PaccMann ecosystem focused on protein language modeling, providing embeddings and representations for downstream drug sensitivity prediction tasks.

name: ProGen3
one_line_profile: Family of protein language models for sequence generation
detailed_description: The third generation of ProGen models, designed for controllable protein sequence generation and design, offering improved performance and capabilities.

name: ProseLM
one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned protein language model for design
detailed_description: A protein language model adapted for structure-conditioned design, allowing for the generation of sequences that fit specific structural constraints.

name: EAT
one_line_profile: Embedding-based annotation transfer for proteins
detailed_description: EAT uses Euclidean distance between vector representations (embeddings) of proteins to transfer annotations from a set of labeled lookup protein embeddings to query protein embedding.

name: VESPA
one_line_profile: Single Amino Acid Variant effect predictor using ProtT5
detailed_description: VESPA is a simple, yet powerful Single Amino Acid Variant (SAV) effect predictor based on embeddings of the Protein Language Model ProtT5.

name: CPAC
one_line_profile: Compound-Protein Affinity and Contact Prediction
detailed_description: Cross-Modality and Self-Supervised Protein Embedding for Compound-Protein Affinity and Contact Prediction.

name: TALE
one_line_profile: Transformer-based protein function annotation
detailed_description: Transformer-based protein function Annotation with joint feature-Label Embedding.

name: PreMode
one_line_profile: Mode-of-action prediction for missense variants
detailed_description: PreMode predicts mode-of-action of missense variants by deep graph representation learning of protein sequence and structural context.

name: SeqDance
one_line_profile: Biophysics-informed protein language models
detailed_description: Code for SeqDance/ESMDance, biophysics-informed protein language models for sequence analysis.

name: ProteinLM
one_line_profile: Pre-trained protein language models by THUDM
detailed_description: Protein Language Model implementation and pre-trained weights from Tsinghua University (THUDM).

name: Geometricus
one_line_profile: Structure-based, alignment-free embedding approach for proteins
detailed_description: A structure-based, alignment-free embedding approach for proteins. Can be used as input to machine learning algorithms.

name: SGGRL
one_line_profile: Multi-modal representation learning for molecular property prediction
detailed_description: Implementation of 'Multi-Modal Representation Learning for Molecular Property Prediction: Sequence, Graph, Geometry'.

name: OpenBioSeq
one_line_profile: Framework for bio-sequence representation learning
detailed_description: Focuses on supervised and self-supervised bio-sequence representation learning, developed by Westlake-AI.

name: DeepGS
one_line_profile: Deep learning for drug-target binding affinity prediction
detailed_description: DeepGS: Deep Representation Learning of Graphs and Sequences for Drug-Target Binding Affinity Prediction.

name: DeepCellSeek
one_line_profile: Large Language Models for Single-Cell RNA-Seq Annotation
detailed_description: Large Language Models for Single-Cell RNA-Seq Annotation.

name: seqdesign-pytorch
one_line_profile: Protein design and variant prediction using autoregressive models
detailed_description: Protein design and variant prediction using autoregressive generative models.

name: Ankh
one_line_profile: Optimized Protein Language Model
detailed_description: Ankh: Optimized Protein Language Model for efficient protein sequence representation.

name: ProtTrans
one_line_profile: State of the art pretrained language models for proteins
detailed_description: ProtTrans is providing state of the art pretrained language models for proteins (ProtBert, ProtT5, etc.).

name: ProSST
one_line_profile: Hybrid language model for directed protein evolution
detailed_description: Advanced hybrid language model for directed protein evolution (NeurIPS 2024).

name: VenusPLM
one_line_profile: Versatile Embedding Network for Understanding protein Sequences
detailed_description: Versatile Embedding Network for Understanding protein Sequences.

name: CPCProt
one_line_profile: Parameter-efficient contrastive embeddings for proteins
detailed_description: Parameter-efficient embeddings for proteins, pretrained using a contrastive loss.

name: cheap-proteins
one_line_profile: Joint embedding of protein sequence and structure
detailed_description: Joint embedding of protein sequence and structure with discrete and continuous compressions of protein folding model latent spaces.

name: SPROF-GO
one_line_profile: Sequence-based protein function prediction using pretrained language models
detailed_description: A fast and accurate tool for predicting protein Gene Ontology (GO) functions directly from sequence data. It leverages a pretrained protein language model combined with homology-based label diffusion to improve prediction performance.

name: efficient-evolution
one_line_profile: Efficient evolutionary analysis and design using protein language models
detailed_description: A toolkit for performing efficient evolutionary inference and protein design tasks using protein language models. It enables the exploration of the fitness landscape and generation of evolved sequences.

name: Evolocity
one_line_profile: Evolutionary velocity inference with protein language models
detailed_description: A tool for estimating 'evolutionary velocity' of proteins using language models, allowing researchers to visualize and analyze the directionality of protein evolution in sequence space.

name: DPLM
one_line_profile: Diffusion Protein Language Models for protein generation
detailed_description: A family of diffusion-based protein language models designed for generative protein design tasks. It combines diffusion processes with language modeling to generate high-quality protein sequences.

name: GEMS
one_line_profile: Protein-ligand binding affinity prediction using PLMs and GNNs
detailed_description: A predictive model for estimating protein-ligand binding affinity. It utilizes transfer learning from protein language models (PLMs) and Graph Neural Networks (GNNs) to capture sequence and structural information.

name: Frame2seq
one_line_profile: Structure-conditioned masked language modeling for protein design
detailed_description: A tool for inverse protein folding (sequence design) that uses structure-conditioned masked language modeling. It generates protein sequences that are likely to fold into a given backbone structure.

name: DeepNano
one_line_profile: Nanobody-antigen interaction prediction with ensemble deep learning
detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting interactions between nanobodies and antigens. It employs ensemble learning and prompt-based protein language models to achieve high accuracy in interaction prediction.

name: SeqDesign
one_line_profile: Autoregressive generative models for protein design and variant prediction
detailed_description: A library for training and using autoregressive generative models on biological sequences. It is designed for tasks such as predicting the effects of variants and generating novel protein sequences.

name: SPACE
one_line_profile: Protein embedding generation using STRING interaction data
detailed_description: A method for generating protein embeddings that incorporate protein-protein interaction network information from STRING, serving as complementary features to sequence-based embeddings.

name: S-PLM
one_line_profile: Structure-aware Protein Language Model via contrastive learning
detailed_description: A protein language model that integrates structural information through contrastive learning between sequence and structure representations, enhancing performance on structure-dependent downstream tasks.

name: Evo
one_line_profile: Genomic-scale biological foundation model
detailed_description: A long-context biological foundation model capable of generating and analyzing sequences at the genome scale. It supports tasks ranging from molecular prediction to whole-genome generation.

name: ESM
one_line_profile: Evolutionary Scale Modeling: Pretrained protein language models
detailed_description: A collection of state-of-the-art transformer protein language models (ESM-1b, ESM-2, ESMFold) developed by Meta AI. It provides embeddings for downstream tasks and enables high-accuracy structure prediction directly from sequence.

name: BEND
one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for DNA Language Models
detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmarking framework for evaluating DNA language models on biologically meaningful tasks, such as gene finding, enhancer prediction, and chromatin accessibility.

name: SpeciesLM
one_line_profile: Species-aware DNA language models for regulatory element analysis
detailed_description: A DNA language model that explicitly accounts for species information to better capture regulatory elements and their evolutionary conservation across different genomes.

name: Chroma
one_line_profile: Generative model for programmable protein design
detailed_description: A generative model that enables programmable design of proteins with specific geometric and functional properties. It allows for conditioning on various constraints to generate novel protein backbones and sequences.

name: METL
one_line_profile: Mutational Effect Transfer Learning for protein language models
detailed_description: A framework for pretraining and finetuning biophysics-informed protein language models. It focuses on predicting mutational effects by transferring knowledge from large-scale sequence data to specific biophysical tasks.

name: DeepVariant
one_line_profile: Deep learning-based variant caller for NGS data
detailed_description: An analysis pipeline that uses a deep neural network to call genetic variants from next-generation DNA sequencing data. It treats variant calling as an image classification problem using pileup images.

name: Progres
one_line_profile: Fast protein structure searching tool
detailed_description: A tool for rapidly searching protein structure databases. It utilizes structural embeddings or representations to perform fast similarity searches, enabling efficient exploration of the protein structure universe.

name: Helical
one_line_profile: Framework for bio foundation models on genomics and transcriptomics
detailed_description: A unified framework for accessing and utilizing state-of-the-art pre-trained biological foundation models, specifically focusing on genomics and transcriptomics modalities.

name: ProGen2-finetuning
one_line_profile: Workflow for finetuning ProGen2 protein language models
detailed_description: A specialized toolkit for finetuning the ProGen2 protein language model on specific protein families. It facilitates the generation of protein sequences tailored to specific functional or structural classes.

name: TemStaPro
one_line_profile: Protein thermostability prediction using PLM embeddings
detailed_description: A software tool for predicting the thermostability of proteins based on their sequence. It uses representations from protein language models to classify proteins into thermostability categories.

name: Nucleotide Transformer
one_line_profile: Foundation models for genomics and transcriptomics
detailed_description: A suite of large-scale pretrained language models for nucleotide sequences. These models are designed to predict molecular phenotypes and can be finetuned for various genomic and transcriptomic tasks.

name: DNABERT
one_line_profile: Pre-trained Bidirectional Encoder Representations from Transformers for DNA sequences
detailed_description: A foundation model for DNA sequences that captures global and local context information, enabling downstream tasks like promoter prediction and splice site identification.

name: Graph Protein Design
one_line_profile: Generative models for graph-based protein design
detailed_description: A deep learning framework for structure-based protein design using graph neural networks to predict sequences from backbone structures.

name: quarto-molstar
one_line_profile: Quarto extension to embed Mol* protein visualizations
detailed_description: A plugin for the Quarto scientific publishing system that allows embedding interactive 3D protein structures and trajectories using Mol*.

name: Distillation-DNABERT-Promoter
one_line_profile: Distilled DNABERT models for efficient promoter identification
detailed_description: Applies knowledge distillation techniques (DistilBERT, MiniLM) to DNABERT to create lightweight models specifically for identifying promoter regions in DNA.

name: pLM-BLAST
one_line_profile: Remote homology detection using protein language model embeddings
detailed_description: A tool that replaces sequence alignment with embedding comparison (using pLMs like ProtT5) to detect remote homology between proteins that sequence-based BLAST might miss.

name: ProteinDiffusionGenerator
one_line_profile: Diffusion-based generative model for protein design
detailed_description: A generative framework using diffusion models to design novel protein sequences and structures, developed by the Buehler Lab at MIT.

name: RiNALMo
one_line_profile: General-purpose RNA language model
detailed_description: A pre-trained RNA language model capable of extracting embeddings for downstream RNA analysis tasks, trained on non-coding RNA sequences.

name: PLM-interact
one_line_profile: Protein-protein interaction prediction using language models
detailed_description: A framework that extends protein language models to predict protein-protein interactions (PPI) by leveraging pre-trained embeddings.

name: progen-jax
one_line_profile: JAX implementation of ProGen for protein generation
detailed_description: A high-performance JAX implementation of the ProGen language model for conditional protein sequence generation.

name: esmdiff
one_line_profile: Structure language models for protein conformation generation
detailed_description: A generative model framework that treats protein structure generation as a language modeling problem, enabling conformation sampling.

name: ConFit
one_line_profile: Contrastive fitness learning for proteins
detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein fitness landscapes using contrastive learning to reprogram protein language models, effective even with low-N data.

name: DiffAb
one_line_profile: Diffusion-based generative model for antibody design
detailed_description: A generative model specifically designed for antigen-specific antibody design and optimization using diffusion processes on protein structures.

name: EndoFM-LV
one_line_profile: Foundation model for endoscopy video analysis
detailed_description: A foundation model designed for long-sequence representation learning in endoscopy videos, aiding in medical diagnostics.

name: ProstT5
one_line_profile: Bilingual language model for protein sequence and structure
detailed_description: A protein language model capable of translating between sequence (amino acids) and structure (3Di states), enabling inverse folding and structure prediction tasks.

name: SeqVec
one_line_profile: Embeddings for protein sequences using ELMo
detailed_description: One of the pioneering tools for generating continuous vector representations (embeddings) of protein sequences using deep learning (ELMo-based).

name: peft_proteomics
one_line_profile: Parameter-Efficient Fine-Tuning (LoRA) for protein language models
detailed_description: A library and set of examples for applying Low-Rank Adaptation (LoRA) to fine-tune large protein language models efficiently on downstream tasks.

name: RhoFold
one_line_profile: Deep learning-based RNA 3D structure prediction
detailed_description: An end-to-end deep learning tool for predicting the 3D structure of RNA molecules from sequence, utilizing language models.

name: USPNet
one_line_profile: Universal signal peptide predictor
detailed_description: A deep learning tool for predicting signal peptides across different organisms with high sensitivity, leveraging protein language models.

name: PLM_SWE
one_line_profile: Optimal transport aggregation for protein embeddings
detailed_description: A tool for aggregating residue-level protein language model embeddings into fixed-size protein representations using Sliced Wasserstein Embedding.

name: CaLM
one_line_profile: Codon-aware Language Model for proteins
detailed_description: A protein language model trained on coding DNA sequences (CDS) to capture codon usage bias and synonymous mutation effects.

name: esm2quinox
one_line_profile: JAX/Equinox implementation of the ESM2 protein language model
detailed_description: A port of Meta AI's ESM2 protein language model to the JAX ecosystem using Equinox, enabling efficient training and inference on TPU/GPU hardware.

name: FAPLM
one_line_profile: Efficient PyTorch implementation of Protein Language Models
detailed_description: A drop-in efficient implementation for Protein Language Models (PLMs) in PyTorch, optimized for speed and memory usage during training and inference.

name: PanSpace
one_line_profile: Embedding-based indexing for bacterial pan-genomes
detailed_description: A tool for compact storage and rapid querying of bacterial pan-genomes using embedding-based indexing techniques.

name: CITRIS
one_line_profile: Causal Identifiability from Temporal Intervened Sequences
detailed_description: A library for causal representation learning and causal discovery from temporal sequences with interventions, applicable to scientific causal inference tasks.

name: Lobster
one_line_profile: Language models for Biological Sequence Transformation
detailed_description: A library and model suite for biological sequence transformation and evolutionary representation learning using language models.

name: Merizo Search
one_line_profile: Fast protein domain structure embedding and search tool
detailed_description: A tool for generating protein domain structure embeddings and performing fast search operations to identify structural homologs.

name: Vesicle Picker
one_line_profile: Automated identification of vesicle-embedded membrane proteins in cryo-EM
detailed_description: A program interfacing Segment Anything Model (SAM) with cryoSPARC to efficiently identify vesicle-embedded membrane proteins and complexes in cryo-EM micrographs.

name: GenSLMs
one_line_profile: Genome-scale language models for SARS-CoV-2 evolution
detailed_description: Genome-scale language models designed to analyze and predict evolutionary dynamics of SARS-CoV-2 and other viral genomes.

name: Mistral-DNA
one_line_profile: Large language model specialized for DNA sequences
detailed_description: An adaptation of the Mistral large language model architecture specifically trained for DNA sequence analysis and generation.

name: AbMap
one_line_profile: Protein language model customized for antibodies
detailed_description: A protein language model specifically fine-tuned and customized for antibody sequence analysis and representation learning.

name: Bio Embeddings
one_line_profile: Pipeline for generating protein embeddings from sequences
detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline and library to generate, visualize, and analyze protein embeddings from various state-of-the-art protein language models.

name: PROGENY
one_line_profile: Pathway RespOnsive GENe activity inference
detailed_description: An R package to infer pathway activity from gene expression data using a linear model based on perturbation experiments.

name: PROGENY-py
one_line_profile: Python implementation of PROGENY pathway inference
detailed_description: The Python implementation of the PROGENY method for inferring pathway activity from gene expression data.

name: ProGen
one_line_profile: Protein generation language models
detailed_description: Official implementation of ProGen, a controllable protein language model for generating protein sequences with desired properties.

name: ProVis
one_line_profile: Interpreting attention in Protein Language Models
detailed_description: Tools for analyzing and visualizing the attention mechanisms of protein language models to understand captured biological features (BERTology for Biology).

name: ConPLex
one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction using contrastive learning
detailed_description: A tool for predicting drug-target interactions with high accuracy by adapting protein language models and using contrastive learning.

name: TAPE
one_line_profile: Tasks Assessing Protein Embeddings
detailed_description: A framework and benchmark suite for evaluating protein embeddings across multiple biologically relevant semi-supervised learning tasks.

name: Prose
one_line_profile: Protein sequence embedding models
detailed_description: Multi-task and masked language model-based protein sequence embedding models for various downstream prediction tasks.

name: NetSolP
one_line_profile: Protein solubility prediction using language models
detailed_description: A tool that predicts the solubility and usability for purification of proteins expressed in E. coli using protein language models.

name: RNABenchmark (BEACON)
one_line_profile: Benchmark for Comprehensive RNA Tasks and Language Models
detailed_description: A comprehensive benchmark suite (BEACON) for evaluating RNA language models across various RNA-specific tasks.

name: ProtSpace
one_line_profile: Visualization tool for protein embedding spaces
detailed_description: A program designed to help visualize and investigate protein embedding spaces generated by various models.

name: Protein-Vec
one_line_profile: Protein embedding mixture of experts model
detailed_description: A protein embedding model utilizing a mixture of experts architecture to capture diverse protein features.

name: CATHe
one_line_profile: Remote homologue detection for CATH superfamilies
detailed_description: A Deep Learning tool trained on protein sequence embeddings to accurately detect remote homologues for CATH superfamilies.

name: mlx-esm-2
one_line_profile: MLX implementation of ESM-2 protein language model
detailed_description: An implementation of the ESM-2 protein language model using the MLX framework, optimized for Apple Silicon hardware.

name: Evolla (ProteinChat)
one_line_profile: Protein-language generative model for decoding molecular language
detailed_description: A frontier protein-language generative model designed to decode the molecular language of proteins, enabling chat-like interaction with protein data.

name: ProTrek
one_line_profile: Trimodal Protein Language Model
detailed_description: A trimodal protein language model that integrates sequence, structure, and text to illuminate the protein universe.

name: SaProt
one_line_profile: Structure-aware Protein Language Model
detailed_description: A protein language model that incorporates a structural alphabet (AA+3Di) to enhance sequence representations with structural information.

name: SaprotHub
one_line_profile: Toolkit for accessible Protein Language Modeling
detailed_description: A platform and toolkit designed to make protein language modeling accessible to biologists, facilitating easy use of models like SaProt.

name: ProteinCLIP
one_line_profile: Contrastive learning for protein and natural language models
detailed_description: A tool implementing contrastive learning to harmonize protein language models with natural language models for multi-modal tasks.

name: TS-DAR
one_line_profile: Transition state identification from molecular dynamics simulations
detailed_description: TS-DAR identifies transition states of protein conformational changes from MD simulations using hyperspherical embeddings in the latent space.

name: gLM
one_line_profile: Genomic language model for protein co-regulation prediction
detailed_description: A genomic language model that predicts protein co-regulation and function by learning from raw genomic sequences.

name: ULDNA
one_line_profile: Protein-DNA binding site predictor using PLMs
detailed_description: ULDNA is a protein-DNA binding site predictor that integrates protein language models with an LSTM-attention network.

name: RNA-MSM
one_line_profile: Unsupervised RNA language model for structure and function tasks
detailed_description: An unsupervised RNA language model based on multiple sequence alignments that outputs embeddings and attention maps for downstream RNA tasks.

name: DeepChopper
one_line_profile: Chimeric read detection for NanoPore direct-RNA sequencing
detailed_description: A tool using language models to identify chimeric artificial reads in NanoPore direct-RNA sequencing data.

name: DNALLM
one_line_profile: Toolkit for DNA Large Language Models
detailed_description: A toolkit designed for developing and applying DNA large language models for genomic analysis.

name: Plant_DNA_LLMs
one_line_profile: Tailored DNA LLMs for plant genome analysis
detailed_description: A collection of tailored DNA large language models (PDLLMs) specifically designed for analyzing plant genomes.

name: R-Predictor
one_line_profile: Pipeline for annotating plant disease resistance genes
detailed_description: A pipeline for annotating plant disease resistance genes utilizing deep protein language models and machine learning classifiers.

name: LAMAR

name: LUSH-DNASeq-pipeline

It enables the execution of complex scientific pipelines on various environments from local machines to the cloud.

one_line_profile: Python framework for reproducible bioinformatics pipelines
detailed_description: A python package to create reproducible bioinformatics pipelines by allowing easy import and execution of Unix tools/commands within Python.

name: seq2science
one_line_profile: Automated preprocessing workflows for NGS data
detailed_description: A tool for automated and customizable preprocessing of Next-Generation Sequencing data, supporting ATAC-seq, ChIP-seq, and RNA-seq workflows.

name: toil-vg
one_line_profile: Distributed computing framework for variation graphs (vg)
detailed_description: A framework based on Toil for running variation graph (vg) workflows at scale in distributed and cloud environments.

name: vg_wdl
one_line_profile: WDL workflows for variation graph analysis
detailed_description: Workflow Description Language (WDL) scripts for common variation graph (vg) workflows, facilitating pangenomic analysis.

name: vsn-pipelines
one_line_profile: Nextflow pipelines for single-cell data analysis
detailed_description: A repository of pipelines for single-cell data analysis implemented in Nextflow DSL2, maintained by VIB-Single Cell Core.

name: scATAC-pro
one_line_profile: Comprehensive tool for scATAC-seq data analysis
detailed_description: A comprehensive tool for processing, analyzing, and visualizing single-cell chromatin accessibility sequencing (scATAC-seq) data.

name: nano-snakemake
one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for Nanopore SV analysis
detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline designed for Structural Variant (SV) analysis from Oxford Nanopore genome sequencing data.

name: dviont
one_line_profile: Variant calling pipeline for Q20+ ONT long-reads
detailed_description: A variant calling pipeline specifically designed for high-quality (Q20+) Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) long-read sequencing data.

name: flo
one_line_profile: Same-species annotation lift-over pipeline
detailed_description: A pipeline for lifting over genome annotations between assemblies of the same species.

name: analysis-wdls
one_line_profile: Scalable genomic analysis pipelines in WDL
detailed_description: A collection of scalable genomic analysis pipelines written in Workflow Description Language (WDL), maintained by WUSTL Oncology.

name: RNA-seq-bioinformatics
one_line_profile: Automated RNA-seq bioinformatics pipeline
detailed_description: A preliminary attempt at complete automation of bioinformatics workflows for RNA-seq data analysis.

name: rnaseqlib
one_line_profile: Library and pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis
detailed_description: A Python library and pipeline for RNA-Seq analysis, including MISO integration.

name: choppy-pipe
one_line_profile: Integrated analysis platform for computational reproducibility
detailed_description: An integrated analysis platform designed to efficiently achieve computational reproducibility in bioinformatics workflows.

name: cwlexec
one_line_profile: Tool to run CWL workflows on LSF clusters
detailed_description: An open source tool designed to execute Common Workflow Language (CWL) workflows on LSF (Load Sharing Facility) clusters.

name: zarp
one_line_profile: Zavolab Automated RNA-seq Pipeline
detailed_description: A user-friendly and automated RNA-seq analysis pipeline developed by Zavolab, handling preprocessing and quantification.
